Officers responded to a report of theft in which the suspect stole items from a business. Officers located the described suspect who resisted officers’ attempts to detain her. Officers were eventually able to detain the suspect who was arrested for charges related to theft and resisting officers.

Officers responded to a report of theft in which the suspect stole items from a business. Officers located the described suspect who resisted officers’ attempts to detain her. Officers were eventually able to detain the suspect who was arrested for charges related to theft and resisting officers.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, two firearms were located. The driver was arrested for weapons violations.

Officers responded to a report of a subject walking in the area with a firearm. Officers detained the described subject who was found to be in possession of a paintball gun. The subject was found to have a felony warrant and was arrested.

Officers responded to a report of a disturbance in which one involved subject was reported to be armed with a firearm. Officers contacted the described subject who was in possession of an illegal firearm and was arrested.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery. The suspect, who was armed with a knife, physically assaulted the victim and stole the victim’s property. The victim was not injured, and the suspect fled the area after the incident and was not located. A crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. A residence appeared to have been struck by gunfire however no injuries were reported. Officers canvassed the area for evidence and witnesses. A crime report was generated.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary at a business. The suspects forced entry and stole an ATM. Crime report generated.

Officers responded to reports of a non-injury shooting.  The victim’s assisted officers in locating the suspects who were in a vehicle.  Officers conducted a traffic stop and safely detained the occupants.  Evidence of a shooting was located and two suspects were arrested.
Officers responded to a report of a shooting.  Officers located evidence of a shooting with no injuries reported.  Crime report generated.
Officers responded to reports of multiple vehicle burglaries.  Multiple victim vehicles were located.  CSI and Detectives responded to assist.
Officers responded to a vandalism report.  A city statue was found to have been vandalized.  CSI And Detectives responded to assist.

Gang Enforcement Team officers located a wanted suspect in the area.  The suspect fled upon contact and discarded an illegally possessed loaded handgun before being safely taken into custody by pursuing officers.  An additional suspect was also arrested for an outstanding warrant.
Officers attempted to stop a fleeing stolen vehicle.  Multiple occupants fled from the vehicle on foot.  Eventually, responding officers located the occupants who were arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a stolen vehicle.  The vehicle fled and the driver eventually fled on foot from the car.  Responding officers eventually located and arrested the suspect after he was found hiding in a nearby garage.
Officers observed two individuals in a physical altercation.  Officers intervened and learned that an attempted robbery had occurred.  The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers made a traffic enforcement stop and located narcotics and an illegally possessed handgun.  One occupant was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to contact an individual in the above area.  The individual immediately fled and discarded an illegally possessed loaded handgun.  He was safely detained and booked for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary in which the suspect broke into a residential garage. The suspect was located at the scene and arrested for burglary.

Officers responded to a report of a suspect who was armed with a firearm. Officers safely detained the described suspect who was determined to have fired the gun, however no victims were struck. The suspect was arrested for weapons and shooting violations.

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop on a subject who fled on foot. Officers eventually detained the subject and located a firearm during the investigation. The subject was arrested for weapons violations and resisting officers.

Officers responded to a report of a gunshot that was heard in the area. The investigation determined that a suspect, who was armed with a firearm, committed a robbery to one victim. That victim was able to disarm the suspect and the suspect fled the area. The suspect was later located by officers and arrested for robbery and weapons violations.

Officers responded to an alarm activation at a closed business. Once on scene, officers determined that a burglary occurred. The suspect(s) fled the scene prior to police arrival. Officers canvassed the area for evidence and additional information. A crime report was generated.
Officers were in the area for an unrelated call for service and observed a suspect fire a gun. Officers safely detained the suspect who was arrested for weapons and shooting violations.
Officers responded to a ShotSpotter activation. Evidence of a shooting was located at the scene. Officers canvassed the area for evidence and witnesses. A crime report was generated.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: Homicide Investigation - Florin Rd/Franklin Blvd

Officers responded to a report of an assault. The suspects assaulted the victim with a shovel and then fled the area. The victim sustained serious but non-life-threatening injuries and was transported to a hospital for treatment. A crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. A building in the area appeared to have been struck by gunfire however no injuries were reported. Officers canvassed the area for evidence and witnesses. A crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery. The suspects stole items from a business and assaulted the victim when confronted. The victim sustained minor injuries and the suspects fled the area. A crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of shots fired that were heard in the area. During the investigation it was determined that subjects were causing a disturbance and a firearm was fired during the disturbance. Officers detained one subject who was determined to have fired the gun and arrested him for charges related to the incident.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area and conducted an enforcement stop. The occupants of the vehicle fled on foot and officers established a perimeter. The driver of the vehicle was located within the perimeter and was arrested for theft-related charges. The other occupants of the vehicle were not located.

Officers responded to a ShotSpotter activation. Evidence of a shooting was located at the scene however no injuries were reported. Officers canvassed the area for evidence and witnesses. A crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of an assault in which a victim was stabbed. The victim was transported to a hospital with serious injuries. The suspect(s) fled the area after the incident and was not located. A crime report was generated.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary at a business. Officers canvassed the area for evidence and witnesses. No arrest was made, and a crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. At the scene, officers located one victim who was transported to a hospital with non-life-threatening injuries. The suspect(s) fled the area after the incident. A crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a burglary at a closed business. Officers located a suspect vehicle and attempted to conduct an enforcement stop. The vehicle fled and led officers on a pursuit that was cancelled. The suspect(s) were not located and a crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery. The suspect threatened the victim and stole from a business. The suspect fled the area after the incident and was not located. A crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a suspect breaking into a building. Officers located the suspect at the scene. The suspect was found to have a felony warrant and was arrested for burglary as well as the warrant.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, officers determined the vehicle was stolen. The driver was arrested for stolen vehicle charges.

Officers responded to an assault report.  The manager of a facility asked the suspect to leave the property.  At some point, the suspect struck the victim with a box cutter causing a minor injury.  Officers were able to locate the suspect and safely took him in to custody for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop and located an illegally possessed handgun.  One suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop and located an illegally possessed handgun.  One suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a suspect yelling about killing a dog.  Upon arrival, officers located the suspect and observed him to have a handgun in his waistband.  Officers eventually detained the suspect who was resistive.  The suspect was booked for multiple charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle and safely arrested the driver for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop and located an illegally possessed handgun.  One suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting.  Evidence of a shooting was located with no injuries or property damage. The investigation is ongoing.

location: Rio Linda Blvd / Las Palmas Ave
text: Officers observed an active domestic violence incident.  When they attempted to intervene, the suspect struck multiple officers causing minor injuries.  A less lethal tool (Taser) was deployed and the suspect was safely arrested for multiple related charges.
Officers were hailed regarding a suspect threatening security at a business.  Officers located the suspect and arrested him for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a suspect acting erratically in a residential area.  Officers located the suspect and found him to be in possession of an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a subject. During the investigation, a firearm and narcotics were located. The subject was arrested for weapons and narcotics-related charges.

location: W El Camino Ave / Northgate Blvd
text: Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, two firearms were located. The driver and one occupant were arrested for weapons violations.
Officers responded to a report of an unknown subject sleeping in the victim’s vehicle. Officers contacted the subject who was found to be wanted for a recent vehicle pursuit and was arrested.

Officers responded to a report of a subject causing a disturbance at a business. Officers contacted the described subject who resisted officers attempts to detain him. Eventually officers were able to detain the subject who was arrested for resisting officers.

Officers responded to a report of a subject causing a disturbance at a business. The described subject assaulted a responding officer. The officer was not injured and the subject was eventually detained and arrested for assaulting an officer.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery. The suspect, who was armed with a firearm, stole the victim’s personal property and then fled the area. The suspect was not injured. A crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of an assault. The suspect stabbed the victim and then fled the area. The victim was transported to a hospital with non-life-threatening injuries. Officers located the suspect in a nearby residence. The suspect refused to exit but eventually came out on his own and was arrested for assault.

An officer located an occupied stolen vehicle. The occupant was safely detained and during the investigation, officers located a firearm. The occupant was arrested for stolen vehicle and firearm related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle and attempted to conduct an enforcement stop. The vehicle fled and led officers on a pursuit. The suspect eventually fled from the vehicle on foot and was apprehended with assistance from a police K9. During the investigation, a firearm was located. The driver was arrested for pursuit, stolen vehicle, and weapons-related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Two victims self-transported to a hospital with non-life-threatening gunshot wounds. No arrest has been made and the circumstances of the incident remain under investigation. Officers canvassed the area for evidence and witnesses. A crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a suspect who was observed with a firearm after being involved in a disturbance on the roadway. Officers contacted the described suspect and located a firearm during their investigation. The suspect was arrested for weapons-related charges.

An officer conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, a firearm and narcotics were located. The driver was arrested for weapons and narcotics violations, and a passenger was arrested for a warrant.

Officers responded to a report of a burglary. The suspects forced entry to a closed business and stole property from inside. The suspects fled the area after the incident and were not located. A crime report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of animal cruelty. Officers located the involved vehicle and conducted an enforcement stop. Through the investigation, officers were able to locate the injured animal who was given to animal control. The suspect was arrested for animal cruelty charges.

Officers responded to a theft from a vehicle. Officers located and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located the stolen item as well as a firearm. The suspect was arrested for numerous theft and weapon violations.

Officers responded to reports of a disturbance and vandalism. Upon arrival, the suspect had fled the scene. During the investigation, the suspect returned and became combative with officers. The suspect struck officers multiple times but was detained. No injuries were reported. The suspect was arrested for multiple related charges.
Officers responded to a theft report where the suspect assaulted an employee.  Officers detained the suspect and arrested him for robbery.
Officers responded to a theft report. Upon arrival officers detained the suspect, located stolen property and arrested him for burglary.

Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop on a vehicle. Officers detained the suspect and located a firearm and narcotics during the investigation. The suspect was arrested for firearm and narcotic related violations.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery after numerous suspects stole property and physically assaulted the victim. A police helicopter responded and observed two suspects flee the scene. Both suspects were detained and arrested for robbery.

location: W El Camino Ave / Truxel Rd
text: Officers responded to reports of a stolen vehicle. Officers located the vehicle and conducted a traffic enforcement stop. The suspect was detained and arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of theft. After the theft, the victim called the police and continued to follow the suspect. A police helicopter responded and located the suspect vehicle. Officers conducted an enforcement stop on the vehicle and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located the stolen property. The suspect was arrested for grand theft.

Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupant. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm and narcotics. The suspect was arrested for numerous narcotic and firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a ringing alarm. As officers arrived on-scene, the suspect fled on foot and officers established a perimeter. The suspect was located within the perimeter and arrested for burglary related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a stolen vehicle. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect who was also a parolee at large. The suspect was arrested on parole and theft related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm. The suspect was arrest for firearm related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. Officers contacted the driver who appeared to be intoxicated. During the investigation, the suspect was found to be under the influence of alcohol and was booked for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an assault. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect. During the assault, the victim sustained injuries and was transported to an area hospital. The suspect was arrested for multiple related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle theft. The victim attempted to pull the suspect from the vehicle, but the suspect drove away in the vehicle. Shortly after, the victim located the suspect inside the vehicle and called the police. Upon arrival, the suspect became combative with officers but was eventually detained. The suspect was arrested for multiple related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. During the investigation, officers identified and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for firearm and assault related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary. Upon arrival, officers detained two suspects and arrested them for burglary related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a vandalism. Upon arrival, the suspect was detained. The suspect was arrested for an outstanding felony warrant and vandalism related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a suspicious person armed with a handgun. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an assault. The suspect assaulted the victim with a hammer, resulting in minor injuries to the victim. The suspect was located on-scene and arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers recovered numerous items of stolen property. The suspect was arrested for robbery and grand theft charges.

Officers were in the area when they located an armed and dangerous vehicle. The vehicle was also related to an assault investigation reported a few days prior. Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the occupants. During the investigation, officers located narcotics and a stolen firearm. The suspects were arrested for assault, narcotic, and firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a brandishing. Officers located the vehicle and conducted a traffic enforcement stop. The suspect was detained. During the investigation, officers located narcotics and a loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for multiple related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a suspect who vandalized a passing vehicle. Officers detained the suspect and confirmed damage to the victim vehicle. While detained, the suspect spit on officers. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to the area for a report of a stolen vehicle. Officers located the vehicle and the driver fled on foot. Officers pursued the suspect, and the suspect was quickly detained. The suspect was arrested for theft and evasion related charges.

Officers were in the area when they observed a single vehicle collision. After the collision, the vehicle failed to stop. Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop on the vehicle. The vehicle fled and led officers on a pursuit. The suspect vehicle eventually pulled over and the driver was determined to be DUI. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for a felony warrant and firearm related charges.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: Homicide Investigation – 6500 Block of Freeport Boulevard

Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. The suspect fled on foot and officers established a perimeter. With the assistance of a police helicopter, the suspect was detained. Officers conducted a search of the area and located a firearm. The suspect was booked for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect in a nearby residence. The suspect voluntarily exited the residence, and the suspect was detained. During the investigation, officers located evidence of a shooting and a firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted an enforcement stop on the vehicle and the driver was arrested for theft related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a theft. Officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for outstanding warrants.

Officers responded to a report of a disturbance regarding a subject acting irritationally. When officers attempted to detain the suspect, the suspect physically assaulted them. Officers eventually detained the suspect and arrested him for related charges.

location: Silver Eagle Rd / Paseo Nuevo St
text: Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the driver. During the investigation, officers located a loaded handgun in the vehicle. The driver was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an assault with a knife. Upon arrival, officers determined that the victim sustained minor injuries. A short time later, the suspect was located and arrested for assault related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a suspicious person walking into front yards and looking into windows. Upon arrival, officers attempted to detain the suspect but the suspect resisted. The suspect was ultimately detained and found to have outstanding warrants. The suspect was arrested on their outstanding warrants and burglary charges.
Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of disturbance involving a machete. Upon arrival, the suspect fled on foot but was quickly detained by officers. During the investigation, officers determined the suspect attempted to assault the victim with the machete. The suspect was arrested for assault related charges.

Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle and detained the driver. During the investigation, officers located a firearm. The suspect was arrested for theft and weapon related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop. The driver fled on foot but was quickly detained by officers. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm and narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a subject breaking out windows. Upon arrival, officers the suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Officers located one subject with a non-life-threatening gunshot wound. The subject was transported to a local are hospital to be treated. A crime report was generated.

Officers were in the area and observed a suspect fire a gun into the air. The suspect was then seen going into a residence. The suspect voluntarily exited and was safely detained. During the investigation, officers located a firearm and the suspect was arrested for related weapon violations.

Officers responded to a report of a burglary in progress. Upon arrival, officers conducted a search for the suspect and detained him. During the investigation, officers determined that the suspect was also wanted in an unrelated robbery that occurred a few weeks prior. The suspect was arrested on burglary and robbery related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a vandalism. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers determined the suspect used a rock to break windows in the area. The suspect was arrested for vandalism charges.

Officers responded to a report of a subject looking into vehicles. Upon arrival, officers attempted to detain the suspect, but the suspect resisted. Additional officers arrived to assist, and the suspect was safely detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located a concealed firearm. The suspect was arrest for firearm related charges.

Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. The vehicle fled from officers and led them on a pursuit. The suspect vehicle collided into railroad tracks and the suspect fled of foot. Officers established a perimeter. With the assistance of a police helicopter, the suspect was located in the perimeter. The suspect refused to comply with officers and was taken into custody with the assistance of a police K9. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers contacted and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers determined the suspect was also wanted in a prior theft that occurred on 01/29/23. The suspect was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a burglary in progress. With the assistance of a police helicopter, the suspect was observed fleeing the scene in a vehicle. Officers located the vehicle, conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the occupants. During the investigation, officers located stolen property. The suspect was arrested for burglary related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located a stolen firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers were in the area and observed a suspicious occupied vehicle. Officers contacted the occupants and located a firearm. During the investigation, officers also located a large amount of narcotics and cash. The suspect was arrested for weapon and narcotic related charges.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: Homicide Investigation - 1800 Block of Club Center Drive

Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a stolen vehicle and detained the occupants. During the investigation, officers located narcotics. The suspects were arrested for narcotic and theft related charges.
Officers responded to a report of individual armed with a gun. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspects and located two loaded firearms. The suspects were arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop and contacted the driver. During the investigation, officers located various narcotics and a large amount of cash. The driver was arrested for narcotic related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a vehicle collision. Upon arrival, officers contacted the driver and determined the driver was DUI. During the investigation, officers also located a firearm. The suspect was arrested for DUI and firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an assault involving a knife. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect and determined that the victim sustained minor injuries. The suspect was arrested for assault related charges.

Officers responded to a report of gunshots in the area. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located a firearm and evidence of a shooting. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle and attempted to conduct an enforcement stop. The vehicle fled from officers and led them on a pursuit. Due to the suspect’s reckless driving, officers cancelled the pursuit. Shortly after, the vehicle was located unoccupied. Officers established a perimeter and located the suspect. The suspect was arrested for theft related charges.
Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for theft related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary in progress. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect in the area. The suspect was arrested for burglary related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located narcotics and two firearms. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: Officer-Involved Shooting - Cantalier Street / Baseball Alley

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Upon arrival, officer located evidence of a shooting and observed the suspect flee into a residence. Officers established a perimeter, and the suspect voluntarily exited. During the investigation, officers located ammunition and narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a burglary. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect and determined the suspect entered the residence unlawfully. The suspect was arrested for burglary related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a sideshow. During the incident, a victim was assaulted but did not have any major injuries. A crime report was taken.

Officers maintained visual of a vehicle leaving a sideshow at Amherst/Meadowview with the assistance of a police helicopter. An enforcement stop was conducted on the vehicle and officers contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located a firearm and narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges and the vehicle was impounded due to actions at the sideshow.

Officers responded to a report of a vehicle collision involving a pedestrian. Upon arrival, officers located one male adult who sustained major injuries. The Sacramento Fire Department responded and transported the individual to a local hospital where they succumbed to their injuries. The driver involved in the collision remained on-scene. Major Collision Investigation Detectives responded for the investigation.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers determined that no victims had been shot. While on-scene, officers observed the suspect flee into a residence. Officers established a perimeter and the suspect voluntarily exited. During the investigation, officers located a firearm, and the suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a stolen vehicle. Upon arrival, officers detained the occupants and located a firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm and theft related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located a firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.
Officers responded to a report of robbery where the suspect stole items from the store and assaulted an employee. Officers located and arrested the suspect for robbery related charges.
Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. The driver attempted to walk away from the vehicle but was quickly detained. The suspect was booked for theft related charges.
Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a suspicious circumstance where an unknown individual was trespassing. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located a firearm and narcotics on the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle.  One occupant was safely arrested for related charges and an outstanding felony warrant.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle that immediately fled. The fleeing vehicle eventually collided with a curb and the driver fled on foot.  Officers were able to safely arrest the suspect for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for traffic violations.  The vehicle fled from officers until it became disabled after colliding with an unoccupied vehicle.  Both occupants were safely detained and an illegally possessed handgun was located in the vehicle.

Officers responded to a report of a single vehicle collision. Upon arrival, they located the driver and found that he had a non-life-threatening gunshot wound.  The victim was transported to an area hospital for treatment.  During the investigation, officers located evidence of a shooting.  The investigation is ongoing.
Officers responded to a report of an armed suspect at a business.  Officers safely detained the suspect and recovered an illegally possessed firearm.
Officers conducted a traffic stop and found the driver to be DUI.  An illegally possessed firearm was also located in the vehicle.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting.  Officers located evidence of a shooting with no victims.  Crime report generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting.  Officers located multiple vehicles that had been struck and two victims who had been hit by debris. Crime report generated.
Officers contacted an individual trespassing in a vacant residence.  The individual assaulted officers during the contact and was safely arrested.
Officers conducted a traffic stop on a reckless vehicle.  During the investigation, officers located a discarded firearm.  One suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting.  Officers located evidence of a shooting with no victims.  Crime report generated.

Officers responded to a disturbance.  Upon arrival, the suspect struck the windshield of an occupied patrol vehicle with a baseball bat.  The suspect fled and later led officers on a vehicle pursuit.  At the termination of the pursuit, the suspect was safely taken into custody for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an assault involving a skateboard. Upon arrival, officers located the victim who did not sustain any injuries. Officers located the suspect on-scene and arrested the suspect for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a vehicle collision involving a bicyclist. The suspect vehicle fled the scene. Upon arrival, officers contacted the victim who sustained minor injuries. During the investigation, officers located and arrested the suspect for related hit and run charges.

Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted an enforcement stop on the vehicle and the driver was detained. The driver was arrested for a felony warrant and theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a vehicle burglary. Upon arrival, the suspects fled on foot but were quickly detained by officers. Officers conducted a canvass and located numerous vehicles that had been burglarized. During the investigation, officers located stolen property from the vehicles. The suspects were arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a burglary after the victim came home and found the suspect inside their home. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect on-scene. The suspect was arrested for burglary related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located one victim that was uninjured. Officers conducted a search of the area and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers also recovered a firearm. The suspect was arrested for assault related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a disturbance where an unknown subject was banging on doors. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located a concealed firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement on a vehicle. The vehicle failed to stop, and a pursuit ensued. Due to the suspect’s reckless driving, officers terminated the pursuit. Officers located the abandoned suspect vehicle a short time later. With the assistance of witnesses on-scene, officers located and detained the driver. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a vehicle collision involving a pedestrian. The pedestrian sustained major injuries and was pronounced deceased on-scene. The involved vehicle continued driving after the collision but was located a short time later. Major Collision Investigations Unit Detectives responded and took over the investigation.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary in progress. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect inside the victim’s residence. The suspect was arrested on burglary related charges.
Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted an enforcement stop on the vehicle and detained the occupants.The driver was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to multiple locations throughout the city for reports of a sideshow. Officers observed over 200 vehicles in attendance. At one point, in the area of Florin Rd and Amherst Dr, an individual fired a gun into the crowd, causing the group to break up. No injuries or damage were reported. Officers monitored the group at multiple locations and took enforcement action when safe to do so. Numerous traffic enforcement stops were made resulting in 9 traffic citations, 2 misdemeanor citations, 1 felony warrant arrest and 4 impounded vehicles.
Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm and narcotics. The suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of an assault involving pepper spray. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a stabbing. Upon arrival, officers located one victim with non-life-threatening wounds. The victim refused medical aid. The suspect was arrested for assault and vandalism related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a theft involving a security guard. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect and determined a robbery occurred. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a subject trespassing. Upon arrival, the suspect fled on foot. The suspect was detained a short time later and arrested for related charges.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: Homicide Investigation and Arrest - 2400 Block of Meadowview Rd

Officers responded to reports of a theft.  Upon arrival, officers attempted to detain the suspect, but he refused to comply.  Officers continued to follow the suspect while using de-escalation techniques. The suspect was safely detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers located a suspicious vehicle.  Officers contacted the occupants in the vehicle and located an illegal fireman.  The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area.  They conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the occupants. During the investigation officers located a stolen firearm. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a sideshow involving approximant 30 cars. After a period of time, the crowd dispersed. No arrests were made.
Officers were in the area when they located a vehicle that had been carjacked. Officers conducted an enforcement stop and detained the driver. The driver was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a suspicious person. Upon arrival, officer located the suspect in a stolen vehicle. The suspect fled on foot from officers and a short foot pursuit ensued. The suspect was detained. During the investigation, officers also determined that the suspect was responsible for numerous vehicle burglaries earlier that day. Officers located stolen property from those vehicle burglaries. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a bicycle theft. After completing the report, officers took it upon themselves to replace the victim’s bike. Officers returned to the victims residence and delivered the bike.
Officers responded to a report of a robbery. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was positively identified and arrested for robbery related charges.
Officers responded to a report of an assault involving a firearm. Upon arrival, officers identified and located the suspect. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the driver. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop. The suspect vehicle failed to stop and a brief vehicle pursuit ensued. The suspect vehicle collided into an unoccupied parked vehicle and the occupants in the vehicle fled on foot. With the assistance of a police helicopter, two suspects were located and detained. Both suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a theft. Officers attempted to detain the suspect but he resisted. Additional officers arrived on-scene and safely detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers responded to the 400 block of K Street regarding an individual who had been shot.  Upon arrival, officers located two victims with non-life-threatening gun shot wounds. Both victims were transported to a local hospital. No suspects have been arrested. The remains an active investigation.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery at gunpoint. During the investigation, officers identified the suspect. Detectives conducted follow-up and located the suspect as well as the firearm used in the robbery. The suspect was arrested for robbery related charges.

Officers responded to a disturbance that escalated into a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located one male victim who sustained non-life-threatening gun shot wounds. The victim was transported to an area hospital to be treated. The suspect was detained on-scene and arrested for assault and firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a theft. Upon arrival, officers observed the suspects leaving in a vehicle. Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the occupants. During the investigation, officers located two firearms and stolen property. The suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop. The vehicle fled and a short pursuit ensued. The suspect vehicle became disabled after a minor collision. Two suspects fled from the vehicle on foot but were both safely detained by officers. During the investigation, officer located two illegal firearms. Both suspects were arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop. The vehicle fled and a short pursuit ensued. The suspect eventually stopped and was arrested for theft and evasion related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a burglary. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located evidence of the burglary and arrested the suspect for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery. Upon arrival, the suspect attempted to flee on a bicycle. With the assistance of a police helicopter, the suspect was safely detained and arrested for robbery related charges.

Officers were in the area when they located a vehicle associated with an armed robbery. Officers contacted and detained the driver of the vehicle. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Officers located a male, adult, victim with non-life-threatening gun shot wounds. The victim was transported to an area hospital to be treated for their injuries. No arrests have been made. The remains an active investigation.

Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers contacted the occupants of the vehicle and detained them. One suspect was arrested for theft related charges and the other suspect was arrested for a felony warrant.

Officers were dispatched to a report of an individual who had assaulted multiple people and vandalized property. Upon arrival, officers attempted to detain the suspect, but the suspect physically resisted. Additional officers arrived on-scene and safely detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers were responded to a vehicle collision involving a motorcycle. Upon arrival, officers located on individual who sustained major injuries. The Sacramento Fire Department responded and pronounced the individual deceased on scene. The driver of the vehicle involved in the collision remained on-scene. Major Collision Investigation Unit Detectives responded for the investigation.

Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the driver of the vehicle. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm. The driver was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a disturbance involving a weapon. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect and determined that suspect assaulted the victim with a firearm. During the investigation, officers also located a firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the 6100 block of Freeport Blvd regarding reports of multiple helicopters that had been broken into. Upon arrival, officers located a helicopter that had been operated with major damage. The investigation was later taken over by the FBI.
Officers conducted a search at a residence related to an investigation.  During the search, officers located two illegally possessed handguns and narcotics.

location: Rio Linda Blvd / El Camino Ave
text: Officers conducted a subject stop and detained the individual. During the investigation, officers located a stolen firearm and narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a disturbance call and contacted all involved individuals. During the investigation, officers located a firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an individual who had a gunshot wound.  Upon arrival, officers located a male adult with a gunshot wound.  The individual was transported to an area hospital where the injury was determined to be non-life-threatening.  The investigation is active.
Officers responded to a report of an assault. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect and determined that victim sustained moderate injuries. The suspect was arrest for related charges.

Officers recognized a subject in the area known to have an outstanding felony warrant. Officers attempted to detain the suspect, but the suspect resisted. Additional officers arrived on-scene and the suspect was safely detained and arrested for the outstanding warrant.

Officers responded to a report of an armed robbery that had just occurred. Officers attempted to detain the suspect who were still on-scene, but both suspects fled on foot. A foot pursuit ensued, and additional officers responded to assist. Both suspects were safely detained by pursuing officers. Once suspect discarded an illegally possessed handgun while running and a second illegally possessed handgun was located on the other suspect. The stolen property was recovered by officers and the suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of an assault with bleach. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for assault related charges.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: Fatal Hit-and-Run Collision – Stockton Boulevard & 20th Avenue

Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop but the driver fled on foot. Officers established a perimeter, and the suspect was located with the assistance of a police helicopter. The suspect was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers contacted a group of individuals drinking in public. During the investigation, officers attempted to detain one of the suspects, but the suspect physically resisted. Other members from the group attempted to intervene with the detention and additional officers responded to assist. Two suspects were safely detained and arrested for related charges.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: Fatal Hit-and-Run Collision – Franklin Boulevard & 26th Avenue

Officers responded to a report of a robbery in progress. Before officers arrived on-scene, the suspect fled in a vehicle. Officers located the suspect vehicle and attempted to conduct an enforcement stop. The driver failed to stop, and a vehicle pursuit ensued. During the pursuit, the suspect vehicle became disabled, and the suspect was safely detained. The suspect was arrested for robbery and evasion related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a robbery. Officers located the suspect in the area and detained them. Officers recovered the stolen property and arrested the suspect for robbery related charges.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/liveview.aspx?reference=20230320-017

Officers responded to a report of an assault with a knife. Upon arrival, officers located two victims with non-life-threatening injuries. The victims were transported to an area hospital to be treated for their injuries. No suspects have been arrested. A crime report was generated.
Officers responded to a theft report. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located an illegal handgun. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to a report of shooting. Upon arrival, officers did not locate any victims. Officers conducted a search of the area and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located a firearm, and the suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a residence regarding a suspect on-scene wanted for a stabbing that occurred a few days prior. Detectives obtained an arrest warrant for the suspect and executed a search warrant at the suspects residence. The suspect was safely detained and arrested for assault related charges.

Officers from the Sacramento Police Department's South Gang Enforcement Team conducted a month long narcotics and firearms investigation. During the investigation, officers seized 51 pounds of crystal methamphetamine and 62 firearms. Three adult suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to an alarm activation. Upon arrival, officers detained two suspects and confirmed with the homeowner that no one should be home. Both suspects were booked for burglary related charges.
Officers received information regarding the location of a suspect wanted on $1 million dollar warrant. Officers conducted an attempt pickup and arrested the suspect for their outstanding warrant.

Officers responded to a disturbance call. Upon arrival, officers determined that the victim sustained minor injuries after the suspect attempted to assault the victim with a knife. The suspect was arrested for assault related charges.

location: Rio Linda Blvd / Del Paso Blvd
text: Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop and the driver failed to stop. A short vehicle pursuit ensued before the driver stopped. Officers detained the driver and arrested them for pursuit and DUI related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a stolen vehicle. Upon arrival, officers located the vehicle and detained the driver. The driver was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a subject armed with a firearm. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect and confirmed he was armed with a handgun. The suspect refused to comply to officers’ commands. Officers deployed their Conducted Energy Devices (CED), which disarmed the suspect. The suspect was safely taken into custody and officers located the loaded handgun. The suspect was transported to an area hospital to be treated for minor injuries. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop on a bicyclist. The suspect fled from officers on the bike and then fled on foot. Officers established a perimeter. With the assistance of a police K9, the suspect was located in the perimeter and was safely detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a subject brandishing a firearm. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located a handgun. The suspect was arrest for firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a subject attempting to light a vacant building on fire. Upon arrival, officer attempted to detain the suspect, but the suspect fled on foot. A foot pursuit ensued, and additional officers responded to assist. The was suspect was safely detained. The suspect was arrested for evasion charges and an outstanding warrant.

Officers responded to a report of a disabled vehicle. Upon arrival, officers contacted the driver who was determined to be driving under the influence. During the investigation, officers also located a concealed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located a loaded handgun. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.
Officers responded to the area regarding a stolen vehicle. Upon arrival, officers detained the driver who was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery in progress. Upon arrival, officers attempted to detain the suspect. The suspect fled on foot from officers and a foot pursuit ensued. Officers safely detained the suspect who was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a robbery. Upon arrival, the suspect fled on foot but was quickly detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an armed robbery with a knife. The victim disarmed the suspect and detained the suspect until officers arrived. The suspect was arrested for assault and robbery related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area and attempted to conduct an enforcement stop. The suspect vehicle fled from officers and a vehicle pursuit ensued. During the pursuit, the suspect vehicle became disabled, and the suspect fled on foot from the vehicle. After a short foot pursuit, the suspect was safely detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a brandishing involving a machete. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect and arrested them for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of an occupied stolen vehicle. Upon arrival, officers conducted an enforcement stop and detained the occupants. The suspect was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an assault. Upon arrival, officers located the victim who had visible injuries but declined to be transported to a hospital. Officers located the suspect in the area and arrested the suspect for assault related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a brandishing involving a firearm. Upon arrival, officers contacted the involved individuals and located a firearm.  The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of the suspect brandishing a firearm. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect. During the investigation, they located a handgun. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. The vehicle parked and the occupants exited the vehicle. Officers safely detained the occupants and arrested the driver for theft related charges.
Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted an enforcement stop and detained the driver. The driver was arrested for theft related charges.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: Homicide Investigation - 4400 Block of 71st Street
Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted an enforcement stop and detained the driver. The driver was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to reports of the suspect brandishing a knife and threatening people. The suspect was located in the area and safely detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges and an outstanding felony warrant.
Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the occupants. During the investigation, officers located a handgun and narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the driver. During the investigation, officers located an illegal handgun. The driver was arrested for firearm related charges and an outstanding felony warrant.

Officers responded to a report of vandalism. Upon arrival, officers attempted to detain the suspect, but the suspect fled on foot. When officers caught up to the suspect, the suspect physically resisted. Additional officers responded to assist, and the suspect was detained. The suspect was booked for vandalism and resisting arrest.

location: Gateway Oaks Blvd / W El Camino Ave
text: Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop.  During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of gunshots in the area. Upon arrival, officers located evidence of a shooting. During the investigation, officers detained the suspect and located a handgun. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a vehicle recklessly driving in the area and attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop. The vehicle failed to yield, and a short vehicle pursuit ensued. The suspect collided into pole and was detained. During the investigation, officers determined that the suspect vehicle was an unreported stolen vehicle. The suspect was arrested for pursuit and theft related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect inside the building. The suspect was arrested for burglary related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an individual attempting to assault people and vandalize cars. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect but were unable to locate any victims. The suspect was arrested for a parole violation.

location: Northgate Blvd / W El Camino Ave
text: Officers observed a suspect on a motorcycle known to have a felony warrant. Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop but the suspect failed to yield. After a short vehicle pursuit, the suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted an enforcement stop and detained the driver. The driver was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers observed a vehicle speeding in the area and attempted to conduct an enforcement stop. The vehicle failed to stop, and a vehicle pursuit ensued. During the pursuit, the driver voluntarily pulled over and was safely detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary in progress. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect inside the residence. The suspect was detained and arrested for burglary related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. As officers responded, the car crashed into a parked car and the occupants fled on foot from the vehicle. Officers established a perimeter, and the suspect was safely located. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a reckless driver and attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop. The vehicle failed to yield, and a vehicle pursuit ensured. The pursuit continued until the suspect vehicle stopped at the dead end of a street. The driver was safely detained and arrested for evasion related charges.ﾠ

Officers responded to a report of the suspect brandishing a firearm. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located a firearm and arrested the suspect for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the driver. During the investigation, officers located narcotics and a firearm. The driver was arrested on related charges.ﾠ
Officers responded to a report of an assault with rocks. Upon arrival, officers located the uninjured victim and the suspect. The suspect was arrested for assault related charges.ﾠ

location: 5100 Block of Martin Luther King Blvd
text: Officers responded to a disturbance at a vacant residence. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for an outstanding felony warrant.ﾠ

Officers responded to reports of a burglary. Upon arrival, officers quickly detained two suspects. Based on the investigation, the two suspects were arrested for burglary and conspiracy related charges.ﾠ

Officers responded to a report of a robbery. Upon arrival, witnesses directed officers to the suspect who was detained. During the investigation, officers located the stolen property and returned it to the victim. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a 3-year-old who accidentally shot himself. The juvenile was transported to an area hospital with non-life-threatening injuries. During the investigation, officers determined that the father of the child was illegally in possession of a firearm and did not properly store the firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges and child endangerment.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop on a vehicle, but the vehicle failed to yield. A vehicle pursuit ensued. After a few minutes, the driver stopped but refused to exit his vehicle. Officers spoke to the driver who eventually agreed to exit the vehicle and was safely detained. The driver was arrested for pursuit and evasion related charges.

location: Del Paso Blvd / El Camino Ave
text: Officers located a stolen vehicle and conducted a traffic enforcement stop. The occupants of the vehicle were detained, and the driver was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an individual exposing themselves. Upon arrival, officers attempted to contact the suspect who ignored them and walked away. While officers attempted to detain the suspect, the suspect spit on an officer and tried to bite a second officer. The suspect was safely detained and determined to be under the influence of narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm in the vehicle. The driver was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers were in the area when they located an occupied stolen vehicle.  The suspect vehicle immediately fled from officers and a short vehicle pursuit ensued.  The driver struck a curb which, disabled the vehicle. The driver then fled on foot but was quickly detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a stabbing. Upon arrival, officers located the victim and determined they were stabbed with a construction tool. The suspect was located and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect inside the business. The suspect was safely detained and booked for burglary related charges.

Officers responded to a suspicious circumstance regarding a subject wearing a mask. As officers checked the area, the suspect threw a bottle at patrol car. During the investigation, officers determined that the suspect intentionally threw a bottle at the patrol vehicle with the intent to injure responding officers. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers were in the area when they observed the suspect attempt to punch the victim. The suspect was detained and arrested for assault related charges.

Officers observed a suspect known to have an outstanding felony warrant. Officers attempted to detain the suspect, but the suspect immediately fled on foot from officers. When officers caught up to the suspect, he continued to resist. Additional units arrived to assist, and the suspect was safely detained. During the investigation, officers located a large amount of narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers were searching an area for a wanted subject when they came across four individuals actively fighting.  When officers approached the individuals, two of them fled the scene, but the other two were detained. The two individuals were transported to jail for resisting arrest and trying to bite one of the officers.

Officers were in the area looking for a suspect who had three felony warrants. While on-scene, officers located the suspect and attempted to detain them. The suspect fled on foot and a perimeter was quickly established. With the assistance of a police helicopter and police K9, the suspect was located and safely arrested for the outstanding warrants.

Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and determined the driver of the vehicle was intoxicated. During the investigation, officers also located a handgun.  The driver was arrested for firearm and DUI related charges.

Officers received a call of a subject who had lit a fire near a business. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect and located minor property damage. Arson Investigators responded and took over the investigation. The suspect was arrested for related

Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop but the vehicle fled from officers. A vehicle pursuit ensued. Due to the suspect's unsafe driving, the pursuit was terminated. With the assistance of a police helicopter, the suspect was located and safely detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an unoccupied stolen vehicle. While on-scene, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a disturbance. During the investigation, officers determined the suspect brandished a firearm and intentionally hit  the victim’s vehicle. Officers detained the suspect and located the firearm. The suspect was arrested for assault and firearm related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area and safely detained the driver. The driver was arrested on related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a stabbing. Officers searched the area and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for robbery related charges.
Officers responded to a report of an assault. During the investigation, officers located the suspect and arrested them for assault related charges.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: Homicide Investigation - 1000 Block of L Street

Officers responded to a report of a brandishing involving a firearm. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm and narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to the area regarding a subject with an outstanding felony warrant. After an extensive search, officers located the suspect who was safely arrested for the outstanding warrant.
Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the driver. The suspect was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a burglary where the victim observed a suspect break into a business. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located stolen items from the business. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a disturbance involving two individuals. Upon arrival, officers determined that the suspect struck the victim with a flashlight. The victim sustained moderate injuries. The suspect was located and arrested for assault related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a burglary at a closed business. During the investigation, officers located the suspect and located several stolen items. Officers also located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a vehicle collision involving a motorcycle. At the scene, officers located the motorcyclist, a male adult, who sustained serious injuries. Officers performed life saving measures, but the individual was declared deceased on-scene. The driver of the vehicle involved in the collision remained on-scene. Major Collision Investigations Unit Detectives responded to process the scene.

Officers responded to a report of a reckless driver. Upon arrival, officers located the involved vehicle parked in the area. Through the investigation, officers determined that the registered owner was driving the vehicle and obtained evidence of reckless driving. The registered owner was cited for related charges and the vehicle was towed on a 30 day impound.

Officers were in the area when a victim notified them of a robbery that just occurred. Officers located the suspect on the victim’s stolen bicycle and attempted to stop the suspect. The suspect fled on foot from officers. Officers caught up to the suspect who then physically assaulted an officer. Additional officers responded to assist, and the suspect was safely taken into custody. The stolen bicycle was recovered, and the suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a subject pointing a green laser at a police aircraft. Officers located and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers recovered the laser and the suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery committed by a known suspect. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect and determined that the suspect had an outstanding felony warrant. The suspect was arrested for related charges and their warrant.

Officers responded to a report of a vehicle collision. Upon arrival, officers contacted one of the involved drivers and determined they displayed objective signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a physical fight. Upon arrival, officers attempted to detain the suspect. The suspect physically assaulted two officers who sustained minor injuries. Additional officers arrived on-scene, and safely detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers were in the area when they located a felony vehicle. Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop and a vehicle pursuit ensued. During the pursuit, the suspect’s vehicle became disabled, and the suspect fled on foot from the vehicle. Officers pursued the suspect, and they were safely detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of burglary. Upon arrival, officers located a door that had been forced open. During the investigation, officers located two suspects inside the building and arrested them for burglary related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery.  Multiple suspects assaulted the victim and stole property.  While investigating officers located the suspects in the area.  The suspects fled on foot and were eventually detained.  After investigating, all of the suspects were arrested for related charges and the victim’s property was returned.
Officers responded to reports of a gunpoint robbery. The suspects brandished handguns and stole cash from the victim before fleeing.  Active investigation.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting.  Officers located one victim who had sustained a non-life threatening gunshot wound.  The suspects fled prior to the arrival of officers.  Active investigation.
Officers made a traffic stop for vehicle code violations.  During the stop, officers located an illegally possessed handgun in the vehicle.  One suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery.  The victim was confronted by three individuals who stole his personal property.  The victim was uninjured.  The suspects fled the scene prior to the arrival of officers.  Active investigation.

Officers responded to a theft call.  The suspect had attempted to steal merchandise from a business.  When confronted, the suspect assaulted employees and vandalized the business.  Responding officers safely arrested the suspect for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle and safely arrested the driver for related charges

Officers responded to reports of a shooting.  Upon arrival, officers located a male adult victim suffering from a gunshot wound.  The victim was transported to an area hospital in stable condition.  Active investigation.
Officers responded to reports of a large fight.  Upon arrival, officers located an unconscious male adult.  The male was transported to an area hospital in stable condition.  Active investigation.

Officers responded to reports of a large fight.  Upon arrival, officers observed the suspect actively assaulting the victim.  Officers removed the suspect from the victim and safely arrested him for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a hit and run. Before officers arrived on-scene, the suspect fled on foot from the suspect vehicle. Upon arrival, witnesses led officers to the suspect. The suspect was detained and officers determined the suspect displayed signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for DUI related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a disturbance. Upon arrival, officers observed a physical altercation between two individuals and attempted to intervene. The suspect continued to physically resist officers. Additional officers responded and the suspect was safely detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a subject brandishing a firearm. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. Officers located the involved firearm and determined that it was a BB gun. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located the uninjured victim. During the investigation, officers identified and located the suspect. The suspect was safely arrested for assault related charges.

Officers were conducting follow-up on a shooting that occurred the month prior. During the investigation, officers detained the suspect and located a firearm. The suspect was arrested for assault and firearm related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a suspect who brandished a knife. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect and located a knife. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a vandalism that involved a rock. Upon arrival, officers safely detained the suspect and arrested them for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery. Upon arrival, officers determined that the suspect got into a physical altercation with the victim before fleeing the scene. Officers located the suspect in the area and arrested them for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary in progress. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for burglary related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a burglary in progress. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect inside the victim bedroom. The suspect was arrested for burglary related charges as well as outstanding warrants.
Officers were in the area when they located a wanted suspect. Officers coordinated with assigned detectives and safely detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a disturbance involving a shotgun. Upon arrival, officers safely detained the suspect and located the illegally possessed shotgun. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a suspicious circumstance involving two individuals trespassing on the property. Upon arrival, officers located two involved subjects and attempted to detain them. Both suspects physically resisted and assaulted officers. Additional units arrived on-scene and the suspects were safely detained. Both suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a suspect who brandished a knife. Upon arrival, officers detained the suspect who was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a vehicle collision. Upon arrival, both occupants were transported to area hospitals to be treated for non-life-threatening injuries. During the investigation, officers determined the driver displayed objective signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for DUI related charges.

Officers were in the area when they observed multiple suspects physically assaulting the victim. Officers quickly intervened and detained the suspect. The suspects were arrested for assault related charges.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: Homicide Investigation and Arrest
Officers responded to a report of a shooting.  Upon arrival, officers located evidence of a shooting with no property damage or victims.  Active Investigation.
Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Officers were unable to locate any evidence of a shooting during follow-up.  Crime report generated.
Officers responded to the area regarding a subject with an outstanding warrant. Officers located the suspect who was arrested for their outstanding warrant.
Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the driver. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to the area regarding a subject with an outstanding warrant. After an extensive search, officers located the suspect who was safely arrested for the outstanding warrant.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located a victim with at least one non-life-threatening gunshots wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital to be treated for their injuries. No suspects have been arrested. This remains an active investigation.
