Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located a victim with at least one non-life-threatening gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital to be treated for their injuries.  This remains an active investigation.
Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Officers were unable to locate any evidence of a shooting during follow-up.  Crime report generated.
Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located evidence of a shooting with no property damage or victims. This remains an active Investigation.
Officers responded to a report of a reckless driver. Upon arrival, officers located the involved vehicle and conducted a traffic enforcement stop. The driver was cited and released.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop on a vehicle. The suspect vehicle immediately fled from officers and a short vehicle pursuit ensued. The suspect vehicle collided with an unoccupied parked car and became disabled. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a hit and run. Officers located the suspect vehicle. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary in progress. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for burglary related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a vandalism. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for vandalism related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an incomplete emergency call. Upon arrival, officers learned the suspect got into a physical altercation and threatened the victim. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a robbery and assault at two separate locations. During the investigation, officers identified the suspects and arrested them for related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop and located narcotics and a stolen motorcycle. During the investigation, officers located additional narcotics. The suspect was arrested for theft and narcotic related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a theft. Upon arrival, officers located and attempted to detain the suspect. The suspect physically resisted. Additional officers responded to assist, and the suspect was safely detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officer conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located a firearm and narcotics. Both suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop, but the driver failed to yield. A vehicle pursuit ensued. During the pursuit, the suspect’s vehicle became disabled, and the occupants fled from the vehicle. Officers quickly detained the driver and arrested them for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a physical altercation between two individuals. Upon arrival, officers determined that the suspect assaulted the victim with a stick. The suspect was arrested for assault related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a large sideshow involving over 500 vehicles. Upon arrival, officers towed twelve vehicles, issued thirteen citations, and arrested two suspects for pursuit related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a disturbance and vandalism. Upon arrival, officers located and safely detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a single vehicle collision involving an unoccupied parked vehicle. Upon arrival, officers located a male adult with serious injuries. Officers began rendering life-saving efforts on the sole occupant of the vehicle until relieved by Sacramento Fire Department personnel. Despite these efforts, the driver was pronounced deceased at the scene. Based on the circumstances, detectives from the Major Collisions Investigations Unit responded to conduct the investigation.

Officers conducted an investigation and obtained a suspect and suspect vehicle description. Later that evening, SPD officers located the suspect vehicle and safely detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Nothing appeared to be hit by the gunfire, but officers did locate evidence of a shooting. Officers conducted an investigation and a crime report was generated.

Officers contacted a suspect with a felony warrant. The suspect fled on foot and lead officers on a short foot pursuit. Officers were able to safely detain the suspect who was arrested for their warrant and related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Preliminarily, it does not appear that anything or any persons were hit. Officers conducted an investigation and a crime report was generated.

Officers contacted a subject who was found to be on Post Release Community Supervision (PRCS). During a PRCS search of the subject’s vehicle, the officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to make a traffic stop for a vehicle code violation. The driver failed to yield and fled from officers wrong-way on N. 12th St. Officers immediately canceled the pursuit due to safety. A short time later, officers were made aware of a collision on Highway 160. Officers responded and determined the vehicle involved was the vehicle that fled from them. Through record check, officers determined the suspect vehicle was recently stolen. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers contacted a subject in a vehicle in a parking lot. The subject was found to be on Post Release Community Supervision (PRCS). During a PRCS search of the vehicle, officers located an illegally possessed loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers from our helicopter located an occupied stolen vehicle. Our Air Unit observed two suspects run from the vehicle and hide. Officers eventually located the suspects. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an assault. Upon arrival, officers located both the victim and the suspect on scene. The victim sustained non life-threatening injuries and was transported to an area hospital for their injuries. The suspect was arrested for assault related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop for a vehicle code violation. The suspect initially failed to yield and a pursuit was initiated. The suspect ultimately pulled over and displayed objective signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop for reckless driving. During a search of the vehicle, officers located an illegally possessed firearm with an illegal extended magazine. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers contacted a subject in a vehicle. The subject was found to be on parole and a search of the vehicle was conducted. During the search, officers located an illegally possessed firearm with an illegal high-capacity magazine. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to make an enforcement stop for reckless driving. The suspect failed to yield and a pursuit was initiated. The suspects vehicle became immobilized and three passengers fled from the vehicle on foot, but they were quickly detained by our officers. The suspects discarded firearms as they attempted to flee, which were located. The suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Fortunately, no persons were struck by gunfire. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/index.aspx
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect fled from the vehicle on foot but was quickly detained by officers. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a person threatening people with a knife. When officers arrived, the suspect fled in a vehicle. A pursuit was initiated. The pursuit eventually ended in Rocklin, CA where the suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an attempt carjacking. Victims were in a vehicle when the suspect entered the driver seat and attempted to drive off. After being unsuccessful, the suspect fled. Responding officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Please see the following link regarding this incident: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/liveview.aspx?reference=20230815-048
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Fortunately, no persons were struck by gunfire. Officers canvassed the area and a report was generated.

Officers attempted to make an enforcement stop for reckless driving. The suspect fled from officers and a pursuit was initiated. The suspect finally yielded to officers and displayed objective signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop. The suspect fled from officers and a pursuit was initiated. The suspect eventually fled from the vehicle on foot, but was located and detained a short time later. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. When officers arrived, they observed evidence of a shooting. Fortunately, nobody was injured by the gunfire. Officers canvassed the area and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect was detained without incident and arrested for related charges.
Please see the following Press Release: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/liveview.aspx?reference=20230820-050

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop on a vehicle. The suspect fled from officers and a pursuit was initiated. The suspect eventually fled from the vehicle on foot but was detained a short time later. The suspect was found to be in possession of an illegally possessed firearm with a high capacity magazine. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Fortunately, no persons were struck by gunfire. Officers canvassed the area and a report was generated.

location: 400 Block of W. Silver Eagle Rd
text: Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Fortunately, no persons were struck by gunfire. Officers canvassed the area and a report was generated.

Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop on the vehicle. The vehicle failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. The vehicle yielded in the area of  Riverside Blvd to Karbet Wy. The driver was arrested and booked on related charges,

location: W EL CAMINO AVE / NORBERT WAY
text: Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The occupants were arrested on related charges.
The victim was assaulted by the suspect, causing moderate injuries. The suspect was located by responding officers. The suspect was arrested and booked for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a bicycle theft. Officers located and detained the suspect near Broadway / 22nd St. The suspect was cited and released for theft related charges.

Sacramento Police Department bike officers responded to a report of a verbal dispute in the 400 Block of K Street. Upon arrival, bike officers located and detained the suspect sitting nearby. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm on the suspect's person. The suspect was arrested on firearm-related charges.
Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the driver. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the driver. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Link to New Release: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/liveview.aspx?reference=20230827-051

location: 2st Avenue / Martin Luther King Jr Blvd
text: Link to News Release: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/liveview.aspx?reference=20230827-052
Officers responded to reports of a felony assault. Officers located a victim with non-life-threatening injuries. The suspect was located on scene and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle versus pedestrian collision. Upon arrival, Officers and Sacramento Fire Department Personnel began rendering medical aid on a female adult down in the roadway. Despite their efforts, the female was pronounced deceased by Fire Personnel on scene. The driver remained on scene. The incident is being investigated by our Major Collision Investigation Unit (MCIU).
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Once on scene, officers located evidence of a shooting. Nothing was found to have been hit and no injuries were reported.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Once on scene, officers located evidence of a shooting. Nothing was found to have been hit and no injuries were reported.

location: Town Center Dr / Del Paso Rd
text: Officers proactively contacted an individual who was found to have an outstanding warrant for their arrest. The suspect was arrested and booked for their warrant.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers located a stolen vehicle. As the officers got behind the stolen vehicle, the suspect immediately fled from officers. A short pursuit was initiated and the driver eventually pulled over. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a threat with a gun. Officers contacted all parties, located the firearm, and arrested the suspect for threats and firearm related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Nothing appeared to be struck by gunfire and no injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers located a stolen vehicle. The vehicle fled from officers and a pursuit was initiated. The occupants of the vehicle later fled from the vehicle but were detained nearby. Officers located an illegally possessed rifle. The driver and passenger were arrested for related charges.

Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. An enforcement stop was conducted, and the driver was detained. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm and found that the driver had outstanding warrants. The suspect was later booked at the Sacramento County Main Jail for their warrants and related charges.

Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. Additional officers arrived to assist in conducting an enforcement stop. The vehicle yielded, and the driver was arrested. The driver was later booked at the Sacramento County Main Jail for related charges.
Officers responded to a vehicle collision. Upon arrival, officers contacted the driver, who showed objective signs of intoxication. The driver was later arrested and booked for DUI related charges.
Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted an enforcement stop, and the vehicle yielded. The driver was arrested on related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect was detained and during a search, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a stolen property report. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect with the stolen property in the area. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. Responding officers provided medical aid to the victim and located the fleeing suspect nearby. The victim sustained a non-life-threatening injury and the suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop for a vehicle code violation. The driver was found to be a parolee-at-large and during a search of the suspect, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a subject attempting to steal items from a business. The suspect used force to commit the theft. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect carrying the stolen items. The suspect was arrested for related charges, and the items were returned to the business.

Officers responded to reports of a ringing alarm. Upon arrival, officers found the suspect attempting to force entry into the building. The suspect was taken into custody without incident and later booked on related charges.

Officers responded to an assault with a taser. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect. The victim sustained non-life-threatening injuries. The suspect was arrested and booked at Sacramento County Main Jail for assault-related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Nothing appeared to be struck by gunfire and no injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Nothing appeared to be struck by gunfire and no injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a suspicious vehicle. As officers arrived, they located the vehicle and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed rifle and narcotics. The suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. A suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and found to be 17 years-old. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery. Responding officers located the suspect, who was safely detained. Officers conducted an investigation, and a report was generated. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a large fight. Upon arrival, officers located an individual assaulting another. The suspect was detained. The victim sustained non-life-threatening injuries. The suspect was cited for assault related charges.

Officers were in the area and located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a subject stealing items and assaulting store employees. Upon arrival, Officers located the suspect outside of the store. The suspect attempted to flee on foot. Officers quickly caught up to the suspect. While attempting to detain the suspect an officer was assaulted. The suspect was detained and later booked at Sacramento County Main Jail for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an individual who was robbed and sustained non-life threatening injuries. Upon arrival, officers located the suspects, who were arrested and later booked at Sacramento County Main Jail for related charges.
Officers responded to a reported assault. Upon arrival, officers located the victim and suspect. The victim sustained non-life threatening injuries. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop on a vehicle. During their investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The driver was arrested on related charges.
Officers responded to a reported assault. Upon arrival, officers located the victim and suspect. The victim sustained non-life threatening injuries. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers were in the area of Marysville Blvd / Bell Ave and located a stolen vehicle. Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop, but the vehicle failed to yield. Officers quickly went into surveillance mode and waited for the vehicle to stop. Officers converged to the area and safely detained the driver in the 5000 Block of Claire Avenue. Upon contact with the suspect, officers observed objective signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. Officers contacted the driver. During their investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During their investigation, officers located two illegally possessed firearms. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. The suspect was detained without incident and later booked for related charges.

An officer attempted to stop an individual on a bicycle for vehicle code violations. The suspect failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. The suspect was detained and found to be a parolee at large and in possession of narcotics. The suspect was booked on related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an individual using narcotics in front of a business. During the investigation, officers located a stolen firearm in the individual's possession. He was arrested on related charges.

Officers contacted the occupant of a vehicle in a business parking lot. During their investigation, officers located a stolen firearm and narcotics inside the car. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers responded to a reported robbery. Upon arrival, Officers located the victim and suspect. The victim sustained minor injuries. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. Upon contact with the driver, officers observed objective signs of intoxication. The driver was arrested and booked for DUI-related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a burglary in progress. Upon arrival, officers located an individual inside the building. The suspect was arrested on burglary-related charges.
Officers contacted an individual who was determined to have an active felony warrant. The individual was arrested for the outstanding warrant.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. On scene, officers located one male juvenile with a non-life-threatening injury who was transported to an area hospital for treatment. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a burglary. Officers located an individual inside and detained the person without incident. The suspect was arrested for burglary related charges and a report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery with a knife. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect, who was safely detained. The suspect was later booked at Sacramento County Main Jail on related charges.

location: DEL PASO BLVD / EL CAMINO AVE
text: Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. An enforcement stop was conducted, and the suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a carjacking. A report was taken. A short time later, officers located the carjacked vehicle in the area of 5th St and J St. A pursuit ensued. The pursuit was handed off to the CHP. The suspect returned to the city. The suspect left the vehicle on foot and was quickly detained near the 3000 block of Alhambra Blvd. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle vs. a pedestrian collision. The pedestrian had minor injury. Officers conducted a DUI evaluation and as a result, the driver was arrested for DUI related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a burglary. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect inside the residence. The suspect was arrested and booked on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery by force. The suspects had fled prior to the officers' arrival. Approximately one hour later, the suspect returned and attempted to steal more items. Officers responded and detained the suspect without incident. The suspect was later booked at Sacramento County Main Jail on related charges.

Officers were in the area and observed a subject known to have several outstanding warrants. Officers attempted to stop the individual who fled on foot. Officers initiated a foot pursuit and quickly established a perimeter around the area. The suspect was located hiding in a dumpster and later booked for their outstanding warrants.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for a traffic violation. The vehicle failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. The driver drove to their residence and parked the vehicle. The driver was detained and showed objective signs of intoxication. The driver was later booked at Sacramento County Main Jail for related charges.
Officers contacted a subject with outstanding warrants. During the investigation, officers located a loaded and improperly stored firearm. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers were in the area and located an occupied stolen vehicle. A stop was conducted and the suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect was contacted and arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of suspicious activity. As officers arrived, one of the suspects fled from officers on foot. That suspect was detained and during the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

location: Timberwood Ct / West El Camino Ave
text: Officers conducted a vehicle enforcement stop. During the stop, the suspect fled from the vehicle on foot. The suspect subsequently detained and found to have two active felony warrants. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers from our South Violent Crime Reduction Team detained a known person on probation. During a probation search of individual’s vehicle, an illegally possessed firearm and narcotics were located. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted an enforcement stop and detained the suspect. The suspect was later booked on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vandalism. Upon arrival, officers located and attempted to detain the suspect. The suspect assaulted an officer, causing injury. The suspect was detained by other officers on scene and was later booked at Sacramento County Main Jail on vandalism and assault-related charges.
Officers contacted a suspect with active warrants. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm on their person. The suspect was later booked on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a suspect brandishing a firearm. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect attempting to flee on a moped and attempted to conduct an enforcement stop. The suspect failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. The suspect collided with a parked vehicle and then attempted to flee on foot. The pursuing officers quickly took the suspect into custody. During the investigation, officers determined that the moped was stolen. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, officers located a loaded handgun in the vehicle. Both occupants of the vehicle were arrested on related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop on a vehicle. The vehicle failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. The driver yielded, was safely taken into custody, and later booked on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an individual brandishing a firearm. Officers located the suspect who was safely detained. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

An officer was in the area and observed a vehicle driving recklessly. The officer attempted to conduct an enforcement stop. The driver failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. The driver safely yielded in the area of Truxel Road / West El Camino and was taken into custody. The driver was booked on related charges,
Officers responded to reports of a robbery by force. Responding officers located the suspect who was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers contacted a subject, who was found to have a warrant. During their investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located a male victim with at least one non-life-threatening gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital. A suspect was detained, and a firearm was located. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a vehicle stop. During a probation search, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

location: Del Paso Blvd / El Camino Ave
text: Officers attempted to make a traffic stop for a vehicle code violation. The suspect failed to yield, and a pursuit was initiated. The occupants of the vehicle fled on foot and a perimeter was quickly set. With the assistance of our Uncrewed Aerial System (UAS), the suspects were located and safely detained. The suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a stabbing in the 2900 Block of X St. Responding officers located one adult male victim with at least one stab wound. That victim was transported to an area hospital for treatment and was listed in stable condition. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

location: Light Sky Ct / Younger Creek Dr
text: Officers located several vehicles driving recklessly on the roadway. Officers conducted an enforcement stop and a vehicle yielded. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm inside of the vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a single vehicle collision. Responding officers located on person on scene with major injuries. That person was pronounced deceased on scene by Fire personnel. Given the circumstances, detectives from our Major Collision Investigation Unit and CSI responded to take over the investigation.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. While on scene, officers heard another gun shot and observed a person matching the description given walking nearby. Officers detained that person, who was found to be in illegal possession of a firearm. Evidence of a shooting was located. No injuries were reported. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

location: Del Paso Blvd / Rio Linda Blvd
text: Officers responded to reports of a brandishing. Responding officers located the suspect and detained him. During the course of the investigation, officers determined the firearm was a replica. The suspect was arrested for brandishing a replica firearm charges, as well as an active felony warrant.

Offices responded to reports of an injury collision. Several involved parties were transported to area hospitals as precaution. One of the drivers displayed objective signs of intoxication. A DUI investigation was conducted and that driver was arrested for suspicion of DUI.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers located a vehicle associated with a robbery that had previously occurred. Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop, but the vehicle failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. The pursuit was called into surveillance mode. The vehicle eventually stopped in the area of Auburn Blvd, and the suspect fled on food. With the assistance of a police helicopter, officers were able to respond to the area, establish containment, and safely take the suspect into custody. The suspect was booked for the related robbery and pursuit-related charges.

Officers responded to two separate calls of multiple suspects stealing items from nearby establishments. Officers responded to the area and determined that the amount of items stolen was of a felony amount in both cases. With the assistance of our regional law enforcement partners and our dispatch center, officers were able to locate the suspects attempting to commit another theft in Roseville. All four suspects were taken into custody and later transported to Sacramento County Main Jail, where they were booked for Felony Grand theft.

Officers responded to reports of an individual vandalizing the business doors. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect in the area. During the investigation, officers determined the amount of vandalism caused was a felony amount. The suspect was transported and booked for felony vandalism.

Officers responded to reports of an individual stealing items from a store. Upon arrival, officers formulated a plan and were able to safely take the suspect into custody as they exited the store. The suspect was later booked for an outstanding warrant and felony theft.
Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. The suspect attempted to flee on foot but was quickly detained. The suspect was later booked for related charges.

Offices responded to a vehicle versus pedestrian collision. Upon arrival, a female adult was located on scene with serious injuries. She was later pronounced deceased on scene. The driver of the vehicle remained on scene. Given the circumstances, detectives from our Major Collision Investigation Unit and CSI responded to take over the investigation.
Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. An enforcement stop was conducted, and the suspect was detained. The suspect was later booked on related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained without incident and arrested for related charges.
Please see the following News Release: Homicide Investigation - 4000 Block of Shining Star Drive

Officers responded to reports of a theft, where the suspect had been stopped by security. During the investigation, officers learned that the suspect also had an outstanding warrant and was found to be in possession of narcotic paraphernalia. The suspect was later booked at the Sacramento County main jail for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. An enforcement stop was conducted and the driver was detained. The driver was arrested and later booked on related charges.

Officers observed a vehicle commit a series of vehicle code violations and conducted an enforcement stop. Upon contact with the driver, officers observed objective signs of intoxication. During the investigation, officers found cocaine and methamphetamine in the driver's possession. The driver was arrested and booked for related charges.

Officers contacted an individual who was known to have an outstanding warrant. Officers on scene coordinated and safely took the suspect into custody. During the Investigation, officers located ammunition which the suspect is prohibited from possessing. The suspect was transported and later booked for the outstanding warrant and related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an individual armed with a pipe threatening employees of a nearby business. Upon, Arrival, officers located and safely detained the suspect in the area. The suspect was later booked on related charges.

Officers responded to a person breaking into a car. As officers arrived, they observed the vehicle being broken into exiting the area. The suspect was detained and arrested for stolen vehicle charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation, and a report was generated.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for stolen vehicle charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop for vehicle violations. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm inside the vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a burglary. The suspect was located in the area and was detained without incident. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

location: Del Paso Blvd / El Camino Ave
text: Officers located a stolen vehicle. When officers attempted to stop the vehicle, a brief slow-speed pursuit ensued, until the suspect eventually pulled over. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. When officers attempted to stop the vehicle, the suspect fled. The suspect was detained a short time later and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a burglary. The suspect fled prior to police arrival. Through great police investigation, the suspect was located and arrested for related charges.

Patrol officers were conducting follow up on a robbery report they took last week. During that follow up, they located the suspect nearby. The suspect was detained and after additional investigation, the suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a vehicle stop. During a parole search of the vehicle, an illegally possessed firearm was located. An arrest was made for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The vehicle was stopped, the driver was detained, and arrested for related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle. A stop was conducted and the driver was detained. During the investigation, officers located two illegally possessed loaded handguns inside of the vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle/motorcycle collision. Responding officers noticed a handgun on the motorcyclist. Through the officer’s investigation, they determined the firearm was reported stolen. The suspect was transported to an area hospital for treatment and will be booked on firearm charges once cleared from the hospital.

Officers attempted to conduct a bicycle stop. The suspect fled but was later detained by officers. The suspect was found to have an outstanding felony warrant. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an attempted burglary. As officers arrived, several suspects fled on foot. Officers were able to detain three suspects. The three suspects were arrested for attempt burglary charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, officers ran the VIN number, and the vehicle returned as stolen. The driver was arrested and booked on related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle. Officers attempted to stop the vehicle, but the vehicle failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. The driver stopped and attempted to flee on foot but was quickly taken into custody. The suspect was later booked on related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle for an equipment violation. Officers contacted the driver. During the investigation, officers located a replica AR-15-style rifle, a replica handgun, methamphetamine, and narcotic paraphernalia. The driver was cited for related charges.
Bike officers observed an individual in possession of narcotic paraphernalia in public. The individual was cited for related charges.

Bike officers observed a subject consuming an alcoholic beverage in public. During the investigation, officers learned the individual had an outstanding felony warrant. The individual was transported to jail and booked for their outstanding warrant.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. An enforcement stop was conducted. The driver was arrested and later booked on related charges.
A motor officer located a stolen vehicle. A stop was conducted and the driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. One victim was located with at least one non-life-threatening gunshot wound, who was transported to an area hospital for treatment. After an extensive and thorough investigation, our officers and detectives located the suspect, who was arrested for related charges.
A patrol sergeant located an occupied stolen vehicle. A stop was conducted and the driver was detained. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. A stop was conducted and the driver was detained. The driver was arrested for related charges.

location: 1500 block of W. El Camino Ave
text: Officers responded to a robbery. Responding officers located the suspect vehicle and a pursuit ensued. The pursuit was eventually handed off to the CHP, who pursued the vehicle throughout the City. The vehicle eventually came to a stop and all suspects were arrested.

Officers responded to reports of gunshots. Officers responded to the area and located the possible suspects nearby. During the investigation, officers located a ghost handgun with a threaded barrel and narcotics. All three suspects were arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to a call of an individual who brandished a firearm. Officers responded and located the suspect. During the investigation, officers located a stolen rifle in the suspect's vehicle. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers observed a known individual with a felony warrant. Officers arrested the individual and transported them to the Sacramento County Main Jail, where they were booked on an outstanding warrant.
Officers observed a known individual with a felony warrant. Officers arrested the individual and transported them to the Sacramento County Main Jail, where they were booked on an outstanding warrant.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, officers observed objective signs of impairment. The driver was arrested for DUI related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, officers located a loaded handgun concealed in the vehicle. The driver was arrested on related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, officers observed objective signs of impairment. The driver was arrested for DUI related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop for an equipment violation, but the driver of the vehicle quickly sped off, initiating a pursuit. The suspect fled from the vehicle and a perimeter was set. A record check of the vehicle showed it to be reported stolen. The suspect was located within the perimeter and arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. After a stop was conducted, the driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a call of a man standing near an ATM with a screwdriver. When officers attempted to contact him, the suspect fled on foot. Officers were able to detain the suspect, who was found to be on probation. The suspect was arrested for applicable charges.

A victim advised that they located a suspect who burglarized their house a few days prior. Officers responded and detained the suspect. Officers developed probable cause that this was the suspect who burglarized the house a few days prior. The suspect was also found to have an active felony warrant. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a vehicle driving wrong-way on the roadway. Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop and the suspect fled. A pursuit was initiated and ultimately came to an end near Broadway/Marina View Dr. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Another victim was located on scene with minor injuries. Officers located a suspect nearby and detained him. After an extensive investigation, the suspect was arrested for related charges.
Nearby officers heard sounds of shots fired. Officers checked the area and no injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

During a probation search, officers located an illegally possessed firearm, as well as narcotics on the suspect. The suspect was arrested for arrested for related charges.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop. The driver of the vehicle was arrested for suspicion of DUI. During an inventory of the vehicle, officers located an illegally possessed firearm inside of the vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop an individual. The individual refused to stop and fled on foot. Officers eventually detained the individual and arrested them for possession of narcotic paraphrenia and resisting arrest.

Officers conducted a traffic stop on a vehicle. As the vehicle came to a stop one of the passengers fled on foot with a loaded automatic rifle. A Police aircraft was overhead and assisted officers with locating and detaining the suspect who fled with the rifle. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. A traffic stop was conducted. The suspect was arrested and later booked on related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle. A stop was conducted. The suspect was arrested and later booked on related charges.

The driver was detained and the passenger fled on foot. The driver was found to be in possession of an illegally possessed firearm. The fleeing passenger was quickly detained after they discarded an illegally possessed firearm. The vehicle the suspects were contacted in was reported stolen. The suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a vehicle stop. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm inside of the vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a burglary in progress. Responding officers located the suspect on scene. At the conclusion of the investigation, the suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The occupants were detained and the driver was arrested for related charges.

location: N. Freeway Blvd / Gateway Park Blvd
text: Officers observed a vehicle participating in an illegal sideshow. When officers attempted to stop the vehicle, the suspect fled and a pursuit ensued. The suspect vehicle became disabled and the driver and passenger both attempted to flee from the vehicle. Both were detained. The driver was arrested for sideshow and pursuit charges.

location: El Camino Ave / Del Paso Blvd
text: Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a possible burglary. Responding officers detained the suspect and after a thorough investigation, the suspect was arrested for burglary related charges.
Officers located an individual known to have a felony warrant. The suspect attempted to flee from officers, but was detained. The suspect was arrested for the warrant.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. All occupants were detained. The driver was arrested for related charges and the passengers were released.

Officers responded to a subject armed with a sword. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect and were able to evacuate the surrounding area. Officers from our Crisis Negotions Team arrived on scene and established a line of communication with the suspect. Eventually, the suspect put down the sword and was detained by officers. He was later booked on related charges.

Officers responded to a subject armed with a knife. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect, who attempted to flee on foot. The suspect was taken into custody and later booked at a juvenile detention facility on related charges.

Officers conducted a stop on a bicyclist for an equipment violation. During the investigation, the bicyclist provided a false name and attempted to flee on foot. Officers quickly detained the suspect, who was found to be a parolee at large. The suspect was later booked for his outstanding warrant.

location: S LAND PARK DR / RIDGEWAY DR
text: Officers stopped the vehicle for a traffic violation. During the investigation, officers located several mason jars full of marijuana and an illegally possessed handgun. The driver was later booked for related charges.

Officers responded regarding an assault report. The victim was assaulted and pistol-whipped by the suspects. The victim sustained non-life-threatening injuries. A report was taken. The suspects are outstanding.

Officers responded to reports of an armed robbery where the victim's phone was taken. Upon arrival, officers contacted the victim and worked with them to track their stolen property. During the investigation, officers located the suspect, the stolen property, and the replica firearm used by the suspect. The suspect was arrested and booked on related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located evidence of a shooting. No victims or damaged property were located. A report was generated.

Officers responded to a business burglary alarm. Upon arrival, officers found that a burglary had occurred and began checking the area. Officers located the suspect hiding behind the business. The suspect was arrested on burglary-related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting where a dog was hit. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries to people were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Just after 8pm officers responded to the 2800 block of 19th Ave regarding a dispute where a firearm was brandished and later, sounds of a gunshot were heard. Upon arrival, officers located evidence of a shooting and determined that one suspect remained in an upstairs apartment. There were no reported injuries as a result of the shooting. Officers attempted to establish communication with the suspect for several hours but were unsuccessful. Officers from our SWAT and Crisis Negotiations Team (CNT) responded due to the suspect being armed and refusing to exit the apartment. Officers from our CNT attempted to establish communication with the suspect for over an hour.Around 1am, the suspect exited the apartment on their own, and was taken into custody without incident. Officers located several firearms on scene. Three individuals were arrested on firearms and assault related charges.
Officers in the area located a stolen vehicle. Additional units responded, and a stop was conducted. The driver was arrested on related charges.

Officers attempted to stop an individual on foot with a felony warrant. The suspect tried to flee but was quickly detained by officers. The suspect was arrested for resisting arrest and their outstanding warrant.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. An enforcement stop was conducted, and the vehicle yielded. The driver was arrested and later booked on related charges.
Officers contacted an individual who was found to have two outstanding felony warrants. The individual was arrested and later booked at jail on their outstanding warrants.

Officers responded to conduct a probation search at the residence. During the investigation, officers located narcotics and paraphernalia that were indicative of sales. Officers also located a .40cal Glock handgun. Three individuals were arrested on related charges.

Officers conduct a stop on an individual for a violation. The subject immediately fled on foot but was quickly detained by pursuing officers. During the investigation, officers located narcotics paraphernalia on the suspect's person. The suspect was transported to jail and booked on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located three victims with non-life-threatening injuries. The suspect and firearm were later located nearby. The suspect was booked at SCMJ on related charges.

Officers responded to a reported shooting. Upon arrival, officers located two victims and evidence of a shooting. The two victims were not injured as a result of the shooting. Responding officers located one suspect outside of the residence, who was quickly detained. The second suspect refused to exit the residence. Our Crisis Negotiations Team (CNT) and SWAT Team responded to assist. After several hours of attempting to establish communication, the suspect walked out of the residence and was safely taken into custody. The two suspects were later booked on assault-related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop on a vehicle for a violation. The driver exited the vehicle and was uncooperative with the officer's commands. When officers attempted to detain the driver they began to physically resist officers. Additional units responded and assisted in taking the driver into custody. There were no reported injuries. The driver was transported to jail and booked on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located evidence of a shooting. There was no property damage and no victims were located. A report was generated. This remains an active investigation.

Officers responded to several reports of an individual aggressively harassing community members in the area. Officers located the individual who was found to be wanted for failing to follow the registration requirements as a registered sex offender. The suspect was detained but began to physically resist officers when they attempted to place him in a patrol car. There were no reported injuries. The suspect was later booked at jail on related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a stolen bicycle. Officers located the suspect riding the stolen bicycle and safely detained them. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers in the area conducted a stop on a vehicle. During the stop, a rear passenger exited and fled on foot. The other two occupants in the vehicle were detained without incident.  A loaded handgun was located during the search of the vehicle. Both occupants were arrested on firearm-related charges.  A search for the individual who fled was conducted with negative results.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver fled on foot, but was quickly detained and found to be 17-years old. The suspect was arrested for related charges and transported to Juvenile Hall.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle vs. bicyclist collision. The cyclist was transported to an area hospital with significant injuries. The vehicle fled the scene prior to police arrival. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Please see the following press release: Homicide Investigation - 6100 Block of Riverside Blvd

Officers conducted a traffic stop and recognized the passenger to be the suspect of a shooting from December 1. During their investigation, officers located narcotics in the vehicle. The driver was arrested on narcotic related charges and the passenger was arrested for the previous shooting.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. One male adult victim was located with non-life-threatening injuries. That victim was transported to an area hospital for treatment. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery at gun point. During the investigation, officers searched the area and located the suspect nearby. Additionally, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. After a thorough investigation, the suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the intersection of 19th St and S St for reports of a stabbing. Responding officers located an adult male with at least one stab wound. Officers provided medical aid and the victim was transported to an area hospital for non-life-threatening injuries. Officers conducted an investigation, canvassed the area, and a report was generated.

Officers conducted a traffic stop. The suspect fled from officers, but was eventually detained. During the investigation, officers located narcotics and an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. No injuries were reported, however responding officers located evidence of a shooting. Officers were able to quickly respond and determined the suspect was in a parking garage nearby. The suspect was safely detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a vehicle doing donuts. Before officers could conduct a traffic stop, they observed the vehicle strike a pole. Officers conducted a stop and observed objective signs of intoxication. A DUI evaluation was conducted and the driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a vehicle with several equipment violations. Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop in the area of Florin Road/ 24th St. The vehicle failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. Officers pursued the vehicle to the 2500 Block of 49th Ave, where the vehicle pulled over and the driver attempted to flee on foot. Responding units quickly established a perimeter and located the driver hiding in a yard. A records check revealed that the vehicle was stolen. The driver was arrested and booked at the Sacramento County Main Jail on related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop on a vehicle. The vehicle failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. After a short distance, the driver yielded, on his own. Officers detained the driver and sole occupant of the vehicle. During the investigation, officers located two loaded and unserialized firearms in the vehicle. The driver was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a female attempting to fraudulently wire money into her bank account. Officers arrived on scene and detained the female. During the investigation, officers located a bag full of narcotic pills and narcotic paraphernalia. The suspect was booked at the Sacramento County Main Jail on theft and narcotics possession charges.

Officers responded to reports of a male adult possibly armed with a firearm and yelling at individuals in a threatening manner. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect and safely detained him. During the investigation, officers did not locate a firearm but found that the suspect was in possession of several concealed knives. The suspect was arrested for criminal threats and weapons-related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, officers located a handgun on one of the passengers and an additional loaded firearm inside the vehicle. The passenger was arrested and booked on firearms-related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an individual attempting to steal merchandise from a retail establishment. The suspect used force to get past the store's loss prevention staff in an attempt to flee. The suspect was detained. Officers transported the suspect to jail, where they were booked for robbery-related charges.

A supervisor stopped a vehicle that was traveling the wrong way, on a one-way street. During the investigation,  Officers observed objective signs of intoxication. A DUI evaluation was conducted and the driver was arrested for related charges.

location: EL CAMINO AVE / DEL PASO BLVD
text: Officers in the area located a stolen vehicle. Additional units responded, and a stop was conducted. The driver was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a hit and run. Responding officers located the suspect vehicle and contacted the driver, who displayed objective signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers stopped a bicyclist for a vehicle code violation. The cyclist attempted to flee, but was quickly detained. The subject was found to have an active felony warrant. The suspect was arrested.

Officers responded to reports of a person with firearm. Responding officers located the suspect and located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was safely detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a burglary in progress. Responding officers located the suspect vehicle and attempted to stop it. The suspect failed to yield and a pursuit ensued. The driver eventually fled from the vehicle on foot. The suspect was eventually caught and arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle driving wrong-way. The suspect failed to yield and a short slow speed pursuit ensued, before the suspect pulled over. The suspect displayed objective signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for pursuit and DUI charges.

Officers contacted occupants of a vehicle who had open containers of alcohol inside. During the investigation, one occupant was detained and an illegally possessed firearm was recovered. Another occupant inside of the vehicle fled on foot but was later detained nearby and a second illegally possessed firearm was located. The suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a robbery where the suspect entered the business and stole a tip jar, while displaying the handle of a firearm. The suspect fled the scene, but was detained by responding officers. The suspect was later booked on related charges.

location: E Commerce Way / N. Park Drive
text: Please see the following press release: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/liveview.aspx?reference=20231225-083

Officers responded to reports of a disturbance. While officers were en route, another male had come out to confront the original individuals involved in the disturbance with a gun. Upon arrival, the suspect with the firearm took off running. Officers safely detained the suspect and located a firearm nearby. During the investigation, it was determined that the suspect with the firearm was also a convicted felon, and the firearm had been reported stolen. The suspect was arrested and booked on related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle, parked with the suspect standing in the doorway. Officers attempted to contact the suspect who instead took off running on foot. Officers quickly and safely detained the suspect. The suspect was later booked on related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle unoccupied in the area. While conducting their investigation, the suspect returned to the scene and was found to be in possession of keys to the vehicle. The suspect was arrested and later booked on related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle and conducted an enforcement stop. The suspect was arrested and booked on related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle and conducted an enforcement stop. The suspect was arrested and booked on related charges.
Officers responded to a reported disturbance. During the investigation, officers determined that the individual had an outstanding warrant. He was arrested and booked for the outstanding warrant.
Officers responded to reports of two suspects attempting to steal a vehicle. Upon arrival, officers located and arrested both suspects. They were later booked on related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop on a vehicle. The vehicle failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. After a brief distance, the suspect pulled over and was safely detained. The suspect was arrested for an outstanding warrant and pursuit-related charges.
Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, officers found that the driver had a no-bail warrant for his arrest. The driver was booked on their outstanding warrant.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. A stop was conducted, and the driver was arrested and later booked on related charges.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to a call for a suspect brandishing a knife at a security guard. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. He was later booked at Sacramento County Main Jail on related charges.
Officers responded to a reported armed robbery of a person. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was booked on related charges.

Officers responded to a possible assault in progress. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect.   The suspect was arrested on related charges and booked at the Sacramento County Main Jail.
Officers responded to reports of a burglary in progress. Upon arrival, officers located and detained two suspects. The two suspects were later booked at juvenile hall for burglary-related charges.
Officers responded to reports of an individual actively breaking a business window. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an individual waving around a firearm. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect and determined that the firearm was a replica and not functional. The suspect was arrested and booked at the Sacramento County Main jail on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of gunfire in the area. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect, who was still in possession of the firearm. After he was detained, it was determined that the suspect had fired multiple shots into his lawn.  He was arrested for the negligent discharge of a firearm and booked into the Sacramento County Main Jail.

Officers responded to reports of gunfire in the area. Upon arrival, officers contacted two individuals in the driveway of a residence.  As they approached the two individuals, officers heard a rifle being dropped by the suspect before being safely detained. During the investigation, it was determined that the suspect was a convicted felon and was prohibited from possessing firearms. The suspect was arrested on firearms-related charges.

Officers observed an individual on a bicycle commit a moving violation and conducted an enforcement stop. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm on the suspect. The suspect was arrested on firearms related charges.

location: GATEWAY PARK BLVD / N FREEWAY BLVD
text: Officers in the area located a stolen vehicle. An enforcement stop was conducted, and the driver was arrested on related charges.

Officers contacted occupants of a vehicle. Those occupants attempted to flee, but were quickly detained. The vehicle was found to be stolen out of Richmond, CA. An illegally possessed firearm was located on one of the suspects. The suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located one adult male victim with a non-life-threatening gunshot wound. That victim was transported to an area hospital for treatment. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to a robbery by force to a business. Responding officers located the suspect nearby. The suspect was safely detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. Responding officers located an adult male victim with a non-life-threatening stab wound. That victim was transported to an area hospital for treatment. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. A victim with a non-life-threatening gunshot wound was later located. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. Responding officers located a male victim with at least one stab-wound. Officers provided medical aid to the victim, who was transported to an area hospital for treatment and was listed in stable condition. Officers conducted an investigation. No arrests have been made at this time. A report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. A round struck the victim’s vehicle, but no injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle into a building collision. Responding officers contacted the driver, who remained on scene. No injuries were reported. DUI was not believed to be a factor. Officers conducted an investigation and a collision report will be generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a reported burglary with the suspect possibly still inside. With the assistance of a police K-9, officers searched the business and located the suspect inside. The suspect was safely arrested and later booked on burglary-related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle that had collided into a building. When officers arrived, they located a vehicle that had temporarily been stuck on the tracks near the location. The driver lost control and wedged his vehicle between the building at a tree. Very minor damage to the building and minor injury to the driver of the vehicle. A report was generated.

Officers responded to a reported disturbance. During the investigation, officers determined that the suspect had violated a court order and had an active warrant. Officers attempted to effect an arrest on the suspect, who began to physically resist and assault officers. The suspect was eventually taken into custody and did not sustain any injuries. The officers on scene sustained minor injuries. The suspect was later booked at the Sacramento County MAin Jail on their outstanding warrant and assault/resisting related charges.

location: 4000 Block of South Land Park Drive
text: Detectives were conducting follow-up on a robbery that had previously occurred. Officers located the suspect and were able to safely take them into custody. The suspect was later transported and booked at Sacramento County Main Jail on related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle. As officers caught up to the vehicle, the suspect was observed exiting and attempting to walk away. Thanks to the quick response by additional officers, the suspect was arrested and later booked on related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop. The driver failed to yield and a pursuit was initiated. The driver eventually pulled over and was taken into custody. The driver was arrested for pursuit related charges.
Officers located a subject they knew had an outstanding felony warrant in the area. Officers arrested the suspect without incident and later booked him for his warrant.

Officers responded to the 1800 block of Garden hwy regarding a male who had just ran at the caller with a large knife. The suspect then ran onto a boat by himself, still armed with a knife. Officers arrived on scene and attempted to establish communication with the suspect. Officers eventually and safely took the suspect into custody with the assistance of multiple allied agencies. The suspect was arrested and booked for assault with a deadly weapon charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle. Upon attempting to stop the vehicle, a pursuit ensued northbound on I-5. The pursuit was canceled because of unsafe speeds. Officers later relocated the occupied vehicle in the area of Broadway/6th Street. Upon seeing the officers, the suspect again drove off and immediately collided with a parked car and metal pole. He fled on foot from the car. Officers in the area intercepted him in his path of travel and took him into custody without incident. He was booked on pursuit related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a bicyclist for a violation. During the investigation, it was found the individual had an outstanding felony warrant. He was arrested and later booked for the outstanding warrant.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop on an individual riding a bicycle. During the investigation, officers found that the individual had an outstanding felony warrant. The individual was arrested and later booked at Sacramento County Main Jail.

Officers were in the area when they observed an individual riding a bicycle with visible narcotic paraphernalia on their person. Officers contacted the individual who attempted to flee but was quickly detained. During the investigation, officers found that the individual had an outstanding felony warrant. The individual was later booked for their outstanding warrant.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. A pursuit ensued and terminated when the suspect vehicle collided into an uninvolved vehicle. The suspect, a 15 year-old, was arrested for related charges, as well as an outstanding warrant.

text: Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located one adult male with at least one non-life-threatening gunshot wound. Officers responded to a robbery to a business that just occurred. Responding officers located the suspect nearby and after an investigation, the suspect was arrested for robbery charges.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver attempted to flee from officers, but the vehicle became disabled. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
