Officers attempted to stop a reckless driver. The driver failed to yield and a pursuit was initiated. The pursuit was eventually terminated, but officers later located the suspect vehicle at a residence. After the investigation, the suspect, a 17-year old, was arrested on related charges.

Officers working high visibility in the downtown core area located an occupied vehicle. Officers observed narcotics in plain view and during the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a loud explosion in the area. Officers checked the area but did not locate any evidence of an explosion or damage. Our Explosive Ordinance Disposal (EOD) Unit has been advised and a report was generated.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle. The vehicle failed to yield and a pursuit was initiated. The suspect was eventually detained after the suspect exited the vehicle near the 2500 Block of O St. The vehicle was discovered to be stolen. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers observed a vehicle with multiple vehicle code violations traveling in the area at a high rate of speed. An enforcement stop was conducted at this location, as the officers were contacting the occupants when they observed a gun in plain view inside. Additional units responded, and the suspect was arrested without incident.

Officers observed a vehicle with an equipment violation and conducted an enforcement stop in the area. During the investigation, the driver exited the vehicle and attempted to flee on foot. Officers pursued the suspect and safely detained them. Officers located a firearm concealed in the vehicle. The suspect was later booked at the Sacramento County Main Jail on related charges.
Officers responded located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop for a vehicle code violation. The vehicle was determined to be a stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers were in the area of Oakmont St and Arden Way on a planned operation, looking for a wanted suspect. That suspect was located in a vehicle. A vehicle stop was attempted by officers, but the suspect failed to stop, leading to a pursuit. The suspect fled from the vehicle on foot and was later located and safely detained. The suspect was arrested.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers surrounded a residence and negotiated with the suspect to exit the house. The shooting suspect was safely detained and arrested for related charges.

location: 500 block of David J Stern Walk

Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, officers located a pistol and narcotics. The driver was arrested for related charges.

text: Officers responded to reports of gunfire in the area. Upon arrival, officers located evidence of a shooting; however, no victims or damaged property were located. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated. This remains an active investigation.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. A stop was conducted, and the driver was arrested. The suspect was later booked on related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. A stop was conducted when sufficient units were on scene, and the driver was arrested. The suspect was later booked on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of gunfire in the area. Officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries or damage property were located. A report was generated. This remains an active investigation.

location: W EL CAMINO AVE / NORTHGATE BLVD
text: Officers responded to a vehicle collision. During the investigation, one of the involved drivers displayed objective signs of intoxication. The Driver was arrested and booked for DUI related charges.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver as detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle, but the vehicle failed to yield and a pursuit ensued. The suspect vehicle struck a fence and the driver attempted to flee from the vehicle on foot, but was quickly detained. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to a reported disturbance. Upon arrival, officers attempted to detain the suspect on scene, who was combative with officers. The suspect continued to resist officers and was eventually taken into custody. The suspect was transported and booked for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a warehouse burglary. Upon arrival, officers observed two suspects fleeing the scene. The initial responding officer was able to detain one suspect, and the second was detained by additional responding officers. The suspects were later booked on related charges.
Officers in the area located a stolen vehicle. An enforcement stop was conducted, and the driver was arrested and later booked on related charges.

location: MILLCREEK DR / W EL CAMINO AVE
text: Officers responded to reports of a two-car vehicle collision. Upon arrival, officers determined that one of the drivers was exhibiting signs of impairment. During the investigation, officers located narcotics inside of the impaired driver's vehicle. The impaired driver was arrested and later booked on related charges.

Officers attempted to locate a suspect with an active felony warrant. While on scene, the suspect exited the residence and attempted to flee. Thanks to the assistance of a police aircraft, the suspect was quickly taken into custody by perimeter units. The suspect was booked at Sacramento County Main Jail on their outstanding warrant.
Officers in the area located a stolen vehicle. An enforcement stop was conducted, and the driver was arrested. The driver was booked at the Sacramento County Main Jail on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a disturbance. During the investigation, officers determined that the suspect had caused a felonious amount of damage to the property. The suspect was taken into custody and later booked for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of an attempted robbery. Officers arrived on scene and quickly detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested and booked on related charges

Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. The vehicle yielded, and the driver attempted to flee on foot. The driver was quickly detained. During the investigation, it was determined that the driver had an outstanding felony warrant. He was later booked on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers detained the suspect and a firearm was located. Officers conducted an investigation. Evidence of a shooting was located. No injuries were reported. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect fled from officers and a pursuit ensued. The driver of the vehicle fled from the vehicle on foot and after a perimeter was set, the suspect was located and arrested for related charges.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. When officers got behind the vehicle, the suspect stopped and fled from the vehicle on foot. A perimeter was set and the suspect was detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. Officers detained and arrested the driver on related charges.

Sacramento Fire Department Arson Investigators responded to handle the arson portion of the investigation. The suspect was arrested for attempted burglary and arson related charges.

Officers responded to calls of a disturbance. The suspect involved was detained and during the course of the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm on him. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Responding officers located the suspect vehicle at a nearby gas station and both the driver and passenger were safely detained. During the investigation, officers located two firearms, one that was reported stolen, and narcotics inside of the vehicle. Both the driver and passenger were arrested on related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle and conducted an enforcement stop. The driver was arrested and booked on related charges.

The suspect refused to comply to officers’ command to exit the vehicle. Members from our Crisis Negotiations Team (CNT) responded and after hours of attempts to communicate with the suspect, he exited the vehicle and surrendered. A firearm was located inside of the vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

The suspect who stole the car and the suspect with the firearm were both arrested.

Both suspects were safely taken into custody, and over $3000 in merchandise was recovered. Both suspects were arrested and booked on outstanding warrants and related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle. During the investigation, Officers located narcotics inside of the vehicle. The driver was taken into custody on charges related to narcotic sales.

Both subjects were taken into custody for charges relating to narcotic sales and the outstanding warrant.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The vehicle failed to yield to Police vehicles and a short vehicle pursuit ensued until the vehicle became disabled. The driver was safely taken into custody and arrested on pursuit and stolen vehicle related charges.

The driver began to flee, striking a police vehicle and hitting an officer with the side mirror. A pursuit ensued and eventually, the suspect pulled over and was taken into custody without incident. The driver was arrested on related charges.

The driver and passenger were placed under arrest and booked at Juvenile Hall on charges related to the pursuit, firearm, stolen vehicle and outstanding warrant.

The suspect’s vehicle became disabled, and the suspect fled on foot. Through the investigation, Officers located the suspect and found them to have an outstanding arrest warrant. The suspect was placed under arrest for assault and warrant related charges.

The suspect was arrested on firearms-related charges.

Officers and Crisis Negotiators responded and attempted to get the suspect to surrender peacefully. The suspect refused to exit the truck and pepperball rounds were eventually introduced into the truck. The suspect still refused to exit. Officers eventually were able to safely detain the suspect, who was arrested for related charges.

The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Within the following three hours, officers and detectives coordinated and located the suspect driving a vehicle. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to contact a suspicious vehicle in the area. As officers attempted to contact the driver out of the vehicle, a foot pursuit ensued. The suspect was safely detained and arrested for related charges including possession of narcotics and their outstanding felony warrant.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. A report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. A report was generated.

Officers conducted an enforcement on a vehicle driving wrong-way on the roadway. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm and the passenger was arrested for several firearm related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle doing donuts in the nearby intersection with the driver holding a handgun out of the window. The vehicle fled prior to police arrival. Officers obtained footage of the incident and the vehicle was determined to be reported stolen. (See Daily Entry Below)
Officers located an occupied vehicle that had been carjacked. The driver was detained and ultimately arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle vs. motorcycle collision. The motorcyclist was transported to an area hospital where unfortunately, he succumbed to his injuries. Officers conducted an initial investigation and detectives from our Major Collision Investigation Unit (MCIU) and Crime Scene Investigators responded to take over the investigation.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers were investigating a report of a stolen work truck worth approximately $175,000 with approximately $40,000 worth of materials inside. Officers located the vehicle in north Sacramento, detained three suspects, and located an additional stolen truck out of Yolo County. One of the suspects was arrested for a felony warrant and related charges.

Officers observed a vehicle run a red light in front of the police station. As the officer got behind the vehicle, they discovered the vehicle was stolen. The driver was ultimately detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located one male adult with at least one gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital where he was later listed in stable condition. Officers conducted an initial investigation and a report was generated. Follow up continues.
A motor officer located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. A pursuit ensued and with the assistance of an outside agency, tactical strips were deployed and the vehicle became disabled. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. It did not appear anything was struck and no injuries were reported. Officers generated a report.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle vs. pedestrian on a scooter collision. The pedestrian was pronounced deceased on scene by Fire Personnel. Due to the fatality, detectives from our Major Collision Investigation Unit and Crime Scene Investigators responded to take over the investigation. The other party remained on scene and was cooperative with investigators.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting and located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. A report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a burglary alarm. Officers were able to determine that a burglary did occur and officers conducted an investigation. A report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a domestic violence. When officers arrived, they contacted the male suspect and detained him. During a search of the residence, the female victim was located unresponsive. The victim was transported to an area hospital in critical condition. The suspect was arrested for attempted murder and domestic violence related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle vs. pedestrian collision. The pedestrian, a 70-year-old female, was located on scene with moderate injuries and was transported to an area hospital for treatment. The suspect vehicle fled prior to police arrival. An investigation was conducted and a report was generated.

Officers attempted to stop a subject on a bicycle. The suspect failed to yield, led officers on a pursuit, and then fled into a neighboring apartment complex. The suspect was ultimately located and found to have an outstanding felony burglary warrant. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers stopped a subject on bicycle. The suspect provided officers with a false name and once correctly identified, the suspect was found to have a felony warrant. The suspect attempted to flee from officers but was quickly detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of people sitting in a vehicle with firearms on one of the persons. Officers worked together and safely contacted the vehicle occupants where they located 2 loaded handguns with extended magazines. The suspects were detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop of an erratically moving vehicle. The driver stated that he had a firearm in the car and was safely detained. A search of the vehicle revealed the handgun, a ballistic vest, and marijuana. The driver was booked on related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. The driver was safely detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a vehicle sideshow and observed a vehicle actively engaging in reckless driving. Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop and short pursuit ensued. The driver eventually pulled over and was detained. The driver was arrested on related charges and the vehicle was impounded.

code: Subject Stop - Firearm and Drug Arrest
text: Officers contacted a suspect in this area who was also known to have a felony warrant. The suspect was detained. During a search of the suspect, officers located a loaded firearm and narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges and their outstanding felony warrant.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery. Officers located three of the four suspects nearby. The located suspects were detained and arrested for related charges. An investigation was conducted, and report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of sounds of gun shots in the area. On scene, officers located casings in the street but nothing that appeared to be struck by gun fire. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.

Detectives conducted follow up of a case regarding a suspect of domestic violence. The Air Unit and Officers worked together to locate the suspect and safely detain them. A firearm was located in the suspect’s vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a subject who advised that days prior, they located a bullet hole in their apartment and projectile. Officers went to the residence from where the shot came from and contacted a subject with an outstanding felony warrant. Officers conducted a search of the residence after obtaining a search warrant and did not locate a firearm. The subject was arrested for their felony warrant and a report was generated.

location: El Camino Ave / Del Paso Blvd
text: Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

A sergeant stopped a wrong-way driver near this intersection. During the stop, officers learned that the vehicle was recently stolen from a nearby business. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges. A passenger in the vehicle was cited for possession of narcotics.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located a victim with multiple non-life threatening gun shot wounds. Shortly after, the suspect called into police saying they wanted to surrender. Officers safely detained the suspect nearby and located a firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle they observed driving recklessly during a sideshow. The suspect failed to stop and a pursuit ensued. The suspect eventually pulled over and was safely detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges and the vehicle was towed.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle they observed driving recklessly during a sideshow. The suspect failed to stop and a pursuit ensued. Shortly after, the driver ran into a neighborhood. An air unit was overhead and surveilled the suspect until they were was detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges and the vehicle was towed.

Officers observed an all-terrain quad driving recklessly and attempted to conduct a traffic stop. The suspect failed to stop and a pursuit ensued. An air unit responded and surveilled the suspect for several more minutes until they collided into a parked vehicle at low to moderate speeds. Officers detained the suspect who was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle vs. pedestrian collision. Responding officers located a male adult who was unfortunately pronounced deceased on scene. The vehicle involved was located on scene and the driver was cooperative with the investigation. DUI was not believed to be a factor. Detectives from our Major Collision Investigation Unit and Crime Scene Investigators were called out to take over the scene. This remains an active investigation.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. On scene, officers located evidence of a potential shooting and a vehicle with recent collision damage. However, no victims or suspects were located and nothing appeared have been struck by gunfire. An investigation was conducted and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a suspect who brandished a firearm after being involved in a collision. Responding officers safely detained the suspect, the firearm was located, and the suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a male who threw a brick through a front door of a business. Officers quickly responded and located the suspect, who attempted to run from officers. The suspect was quickly and safely detained and was subsequently arrested for felony vandalism, resisting/interfering with an officer, and Post Release Community Supervision (PRCS) violation.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle vs. pedestrian collision. Responding officers located a female adult in the roadway. The female was transported to an area hospital in critical condition. The driver remained on scene and cooperated with the investigation. Due to the significant injuries, detectives from our Major Collision Investigation Unit (MCIU) and Crime Scene Investigators (CSI) responded out to take over the investigation.

Officers conducted a probation search of an RV. Officers located a loaded handgun, body armor, ammunition and narcotics. The suspect on probation confessed to possessing the items. The items were seized, and the suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded for a subject that pointed a gun at multiple subjects in the area. Officers utilized armor to assist with a surround and call out. The suspect surrendered peacefully and was detained. Officers located the gun mentioned and it was determined to be a BB gun.
Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle.  The vehicle failed to yield and a short pursuit ensued.  The driver was detained and cited and the vehicle was towed.

Officers responded to numerous calls of a subject causing disturbances at multiple businesses in the area and that he physically assaulted a person. Officers detained the suspect who was found to be on parole. The suspect was arrested for related charges

Officers were hailed regarding a disturbance related to a van at this location.  Officers contacted the driver who provided a fake name. Officers determined the driver’s actual name, conducted a probation search of the van, and located a loaded handgun and narcotics. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a large party with fighting and a victim that was hit by a fleeing vehicle.  An air unit located the vehicle, the occupants fled from the vehicle upon police contact. The air unit followed the occupants where they were detained by officers. A loaded firearm was located in the vehicle.  The suspects were arrested for related charges

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a wrong-way driver. The driver failed to fully stop before yielding a short distance away. Officers detained the driver who was arrested for related charges.

location: Del Paso Blvd & El Camino Ave
text: Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver who was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle that was driving with no tire on one of its rims.  The driver initially complied and pulled over. During the stop, the driver fled from the Officers and a short pursuit ensued.  The driver eventually pulled over and was detained. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to multiple reports of sideshow activity in the area. With limited resources due to other priority calls in the city, officers were able to move the sideshow group out of the area until they eventually dispersed for the evening.

Officers responded to a report of a subject lurking in the area. Officers contacted the subject who was a wanted suspect for domestic violence from a prior incident. The suspect was detained and known to carry a backpack with a firearm. Officers located the backpack and firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a follow up investigation of a suspect. Officers located the suspect and detained him during a traffic stop. During a search, the suspect’s firearm was located. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a felony hit and run vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a vehicle commit a traffic violation and attempted to conducted a traffic stop. The driver did not stop and a short pursuit ensued until the driver pulled over in a parking lot. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle. The driver failed to yield and a pursuit ensued. The driver eventually pulled over near Cal Expo and was safely detained. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle vs. pedestrian collision. The pedestrian was transported to an area hospital where they are now listed in critical but stable condition. The driver remained on scene and was cooperative. The cause of the collision remains under investigation.
Officers followed up on an investigation of a subject with two outstanding felony warrants. Officers contacted the subject who was detained and arrested for their warrants.
Officers and a K-9 unit assisted an outside agency with a vehicle stop in the area for a subject with an outstand felony warrant. The subject was detained and taken into custody for their warrant.

Officers responded to several reports of the sound of shots being fired. Officers arrived and located several casings on the ground. No injuries or property damage was reported or located. An investigation was conducted, and a report generated.

Officers responded to reports of an alarm. Officers determined a burglary occurred. Officers located the suspect nearby and he was detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges and an outstanding warrant.

Officers responded to a report of multiple subjects in a car with masks on and a gun in the driver’s hand.  Officers located the vehicle and detained the suspects. Inside the vehicle, Officers located a mask and firearm. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of shots being fired.  Officers located several spent casings on the ground and an unoccupied vehicle that appeared to have been struck. No injuries or victims were reported. An investigation was conducted and a report generated.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver of the vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.

location: Del Paso Blvd / El Camino Ave
text: Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a carjacking by gunpoint. Responding officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a burglary in progress. The suspect was located and detained. The suspect was also found to have a felony warrant. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. A report was generated.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The occupants were detained. During the investigation, officers located additional stolen property and a stolen handgun inside of the vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver fled from officers and a pursuit ensued. The driver fled from the vehicle on foot and thanks to the help of our K-9 officers, the suspect was located in a nearby field and taken into custody. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a motorcycle, who failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. With the assistance of CHP’s air unit, the suspect was ultimately detained in San Joaquin County. The motorcycle was found to be stolen. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle. The driver failed to yield and a pursuit ensued. The suspect crashed near a levee, exited the vehicle and ran towards the water. With the assistance of our UAS and the Fire Department, the suspect was detained by our officers. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. A report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. A report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a business robbery at gunpoint. Responding officers located a suspect vehicle leaving the scene. A brief pursuit ensued until the suspect vehicle crashed. One occupant was quickly detained and two others fled on foot. During the investigation, officers located a firearm and evidence of the crime. The detained suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located one male adult with at least one non-life-threatening gunshot wound. That victim was transported to an area hospital. No suspect(s) were located. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers stopped a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located a female adult with at least one non-life-threatening gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital. Officers are investigating what lead up to the shooting.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery of a person by force. Responding bike officers located the suspect with the victim’s property. The suspect was arrested for related charges as well as outstanding warrants.
Officers conducted a traffic stop on a reckless driver. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an armed robbery of a person. Responding officers located two suspects, who happened to be 13 and 15 years old. Officers located a replica firearm on scene. Both juveniles were arrested and transported to Juvenile Hall on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located one male adult with at least one non-life-threatening gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital where he was listed in stable condition. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle driving recklessly in a neighborhood. It was reported that the driver exited with a firearm in his hand. Responding officers located the vehicle and the suspect nearby and the suspect was safely detained. A K-9 officer and his four-legged partner began searching the area and located a shortened barrel shotgun nearby. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a medical aid call where a person was located unconscious with a loaded handgun. Officers secured the firearm. The suspect was detained and arrested for felony warrants and the firearm violation.

Officers responded to reports of a stolen vehicle. Security at this business assisted officers in locating the suspects, who happened to be two juveniles. Both were detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located one male adult with at least one non-life-threatening gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. The victim was transported to an area hospital for his non-life-threatening injuries. A report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. Responding officers located a victim with apparent non-life-threatening stab wounds. The victim was transported to an area hospital. Officers conduced an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. Responding officers located a male adult victim with at least one non-life-threatening stab wound. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a person sleeping in a vehicle with a handgun on his lap. Officers arrived on scene, set up a perimeter, and created a plan to safely approach the vehicle. The illegally possessed firearm was secured and the suspect was detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a robbery of a person by force. Responding officers located the suspect and detained him. After the investigation, the suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
See news release: Fatal Hit-and-Run Collision Arrest - Marysville Boulevard & Main Avenue
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. A report was generated.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. Before officers could stop the vehicle, the suspect parked the vehicle in an alley and fled on foot. The suspect as taken into custody and was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. The occupants of the vehicle were detained. The driver of the vehicle was arrested for multiple outstanding warrants.

Officers located a vehicle in the area associated with recent burglaries. The driver of the vehicle was found to be the burglary suspect and was taken into custody. Related search warrants were executed, and additional stolen property and a firearm were located. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a robbery suspect in the area. Officers contacted the suspect inside of a vehicle where the suspect was detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting in the gas station parking lot. Officers located a victim who was transported to an area hospital. Detectives responded and took over the scene and investigation.

Officers responded to reports of a sideshow.  Officers stopped a suspect vehicle away from the area and the vehicle was cited and towed.  The air units made announcements and the parking lot cleared out.

Officers responded to a report of vehicle being shot at. Officers located a single bullet hole in one of the vehicle doors, but no injuries to the victim. Officers conducted further investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to the area regarding reports of shots being fired. Officers did not locate any victims or property damage on scene. Officers did locate two spent casings. An investigation was conducted and report was generated.
Officers responded to a report of a shot being fired.  Officers did not locate any victims or property damage. Officers did locate one spent shell casing.  A report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle and the driver failed to yield, leading officers on a pursuit. The suspect eventually pulled over and was detained. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a burglary. On scene, officers located the suspect and detained her. She was arrested for related charges.

Officers were hailed regarding a person with a gun in his waistband. Officers located the suspect, who happened to be a juvenile, and safely detained him. A handgun was recovered and the suspect was arrested and transported to juvenile hall for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. Officers located a victim with a non-life-threatening stab wound. Officers conducted an extensive search of the area for a potential additional victim and suspect, but neither were located. A report was generated.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. The vehicle failed to yield, and pursuit ensued. The driver eventually pulled over and was detained. The driver was arrested for an outstanding felony warrant and related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle with multiple equipment violations. The vehicle failed to yield and a short pursuit ensued. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

location: 5300 Block Martin Luther King Jr Blvd
text: A single vehicle collided with a SMUD pole causing a large power outage in the area. The driver fled prior to officers’ arrival. A report was generated and SMUD/PG&E responded to the area restore power and to address a potential unrelated gas leak.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Shortly after, a victim walked into a nearby hospital with a non-life-threatening gunshot wound. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a suspicious vehicle. When officers went to detain the driver of the vehicle, they located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a carjacking by gunpoint. The victim was not injured. Officers responded, completed an investigation, and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery of a business by force. With the assistance of our Air Unit, ground officers located the suspect and safely detained him. He was ultimately arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a robbery to a business at knifepoint. Responding officers located the suspect nearby. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a robbery of a person by force. Officers located the suspects and they were arrested on robbery related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. A report was generated.
Officers stopped a vehicle and one of the passengers fled on foot. That suspect discarded an illegally possessed firearm as he ran. The suspect was detained and was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a traffic collision involving two vehicles. One of the drivers sustained major injuries and was transported to an area hospital. An investigation was conducted.
Officers located a stolen bicycle. Officers detained the suspect who was riding the bike at the time and said that he took the bike. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an unknown subject inside of the caller's vehicle. The suspect fled from the vehicle when officers arrived, and a brief foot pursuit ensued. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle and detained two suspects associated with the vehicle. Officers located stolen mail and a firearm within the vehicle, and narcotic paraphernalia in the suspects' hotel room. The suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of suspects assaulting a male. Officers attempted to contact the suspects and a short foot pursuit ensued. The suspects were detained and a stolen firearm was located. The suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted an investigation of a known suspect.  The suspect was observed in the area and detained without incident.  Officers conducted a search and located a firearm. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

location: Blue Sky Ct & Sky Creek Dr
text: Officers observed a suspicious occupied vehicle parked in the area. Officers identified one of the occupants of the vehicle to have an outstanding felony warrant. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers located a vehicle associated with a home invasion. Officers detained the driver of the vehicle who was identified as the suspect in the home invasion. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle collision. While providing medical aid to one of the drivers, officers located a firearm on their person. The driver transported to an area hospital, officers conducted a DUI investigation. The driver was arrested for related charges.

location: Gateway Park Blvd & N Freeway Blvd
text: Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a small sideshow. Officers observed a vehicle driving recklessly and conducted a traffic stop. The vehicle was towed and the driver and passenger were cited.

Officers observed a known suspect driving in the area. Officers conducted a traffic stop and during a search of the suspect's vehicle, located a loaded firearm and extended magazine. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers located a suspect who committed a theft and fled to a nearby vehicle. Officers stopped the vehicle and detained the suspect and driver. Officers located a firearm in the vehicle. The suspect and driver of the vehicle were arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers contacted a suspicious subject in a vehicle. During a subsequent search, officers located narcotics and firearms in the suspect's possession. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop. The driver was detained for an outstanding felony warrant. One of the passengers fled on foot with a loaded firearm. The passenger was detained and also found to have an outstanding felony warrant. The vehicle was found to be stolen. The detained suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle. The officers attempted to stop the vehicle and a short pursuit ensued. The suspects fled on foot. Officers located some of the suspects and detained them. The suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop. Officers conducted a search of the vehicle and located narcotics and firearm. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a subject who pointed a firearm at the caller. Officers located the suspect with the firearm and detained her. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. The driver of the vehicle was detained. Officers observed the driver to be in possession of a firearm. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle that was stolen just prior to their arrival. Officers quickly located the stolen vehicle and conducted a traffic stop. Officers detained the driver and located narcotics and determined the driver to have an outstanding felony warrant. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a possible assault. Officers observed the suspect grab an object in the vehicle he and the female were seated in. Officers detained the male and located a loaded firearm under the seat of the vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

location: Valley Hi Dr & La Solana Way
text: Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop. The vehicle failed to yield, and a vehicle pursuit ensued.  An occupant of the vehicle fled on foot. Officers detained the subject and upon a search, located a firearm with a magazine inside of it. The vehicle pursuit continued and a short distance away until the vehicle yielded, and the driver was detained.

location: W. El Camino Ave & Northgate Blvd
text: Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle. The vehicle failed to yield and a short pursuit ensued. The driver eventually stopped and was detained by officers. The driver was arrested for related charges.

location: W. El Camino Ave & Truxel Rd.
text: Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver of the vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. The driver failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. A Pursuit Immobilization Technique (PIT) maneuver was successfully executed and the suspect was safely detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers stopped a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The passenger was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers were preparing to stop a vehicle when the driver parked and fled from the car. With the assistance of our Unmanned Aerial System (drone), the suspect was located and safely detained. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting and located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting and located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a subject with a firearm. With the assistance of the air unit, officers located the subject and detained him. The firearm was located nearby. The subject was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a subject stop when the subject fled on foot. After a short foot pursuit, the subject was detained. The subject was found to have an outstanding felony warrant and was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a subject stop when the subject fled on foot into a vacant residence. Officers safely called the suspect out of the residence and detained him. The suspect was arrested for an outstanding felony warrant and related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a burglary. The suspect fled from the location and officers quickly established a perimeter. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges and an outstanding felony warrant.

location: Truxel Rd & W El Camino Ave
text: Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. When officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop, the vehicle failed to yield and a short pursuit ensued. The driver then fled from the vehicle on foot. After a short foot pursuit, the driver was detained by officers and arrested for related charges.

location: East Commerce Wy & North Park Dr
text: Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of robbery by force from a business. Responding officers located the suspect a short distance from the business. After an investigation, officers arrested the suspect for robbery related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a theft at a business. Officers contacted the suspect and began a records check when he took off running from officers. The suspect was caught a short distance later and was detained. The suspect had a felony warrant and was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of multiple juveniles in the area with firearms. When officers arrived, several suspects took off running. One suspect attempted to hide. When officers attempted to contact him, he took off running as well. Officers eventually caught up to him and detained him. During the investigation, officers located two illegally possessed firearms on this suspect. He was arrested and transported to juvenile hall.

Officers observed a vehicle driving erratically in the area. Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop when the vehicle failed to yield, and a short pursuit ensued. The driver eventually stopped and was detained. The driver was arrested for related charges.

location: New Market Dr & E Commerce Way
text: Officers responded to the area for reports of a robbery. The suspect fled prior to officers arrival. Through expeditious investigation, the suspect's vehicle was located. Officers located the suspect in their vehicle and detained him. Officers located stolen property and a loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area regarding reports of a burglary. Through investigation it was determined the burglary was unfounded. A subject at the residence was found to have an outstanding felony warrant, narcotics, and a firearm. The subject was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver of the vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop. A parolee inside of the vehicle was detained and during the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm inside of the vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers observed a vehicle driving erratically and attempted to conduct a traffic stop. The suspect vehicle failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. CHP eventually took over the pursuit and the suspect was eventually detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area regarding sounds of shots being fired. Officers observed evidence of a shooting, but no injuries were reported. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.

location: Del Paso Blvd / El Camino Ave
text: Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm and narcotics. The suspect as arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a carjacking at gunpoint. Responding officers located the vehicle nearby and it was unoccupied. Crime Scene Investigators responded to process the vehicle and an investigation was conducted. The victim did not sustain any physical injuries during the carjacking.

Officers responded to reports of a male who brandished a handgun. Officers arrived and detained the suspect. During the investigation, officers located the handgun and an illegally possessed rifle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. A report was generated.

Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle. The driver of the vehicle was found to be on probation. During a search, officers located an illegally possessed firearm in the vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers located a suspect vehicle involved in a recent felony crime. Officers attempted to stop the vehicle; however it failed to yield to officers and a pursuit ensued. The vehicle eventually stopped, and the driver was detained. Officers located a firearm in the vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle for reckless driving. During a search of the vehicle, officers located a loaded, stolen firearm and magazine. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a subject who brandished a knife. Officers located the suspect who chased an officer with the knife. Officers quickly set up a perimeter around the suspect. After lengthy negotiations, the suspect was taken into custody utilizing less lethal force. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of sounds of shots being fired. Officers located evidence of a shooting on scene but no reported victims. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle. As the vehicle was slowing, the passenger fled on foot from the vehicle. Officers were able to detain all occupants and the suspect that fled from the vehicle. The suspect and one of the occupants were found to have outstanding warrants and a stolen firearm. They were arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle they observed driving recklessly in the area. The vehicle failed to stop, and a brief pursuit ensued. Both occupants of the vehicle fled on foot. A perimeter was established; however, the suspects were not located.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a vehicle driving recklessly in the area and attempted to conduct a traffic stop. The vehicle failed to yield and a short pursuit ensued but was cancelled due to the conditions. Shortly after, the suspect’s vehicle became disabled, and the suspect was detained by officers. The suspect was arrested for DUI and related charges.

Officers observed a suspect manipulating a parking meter with scissors. Officers contacted the suspect, who admitted to breaking into several other parking meters previously. After a thorough investigation, the suspect was arrested for theft related charges.

Officers responded to the area for reports of a subject stealing copper wire from an underground electrical box. Officers arrived, and detained the suspect. The suspect was found to be in possession of stolen copper wire. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting.  Officers investigated and located evidence of a shooting but no victims.  An investigation was conducted a report was taken.

Officers responded to a report of a subject who brandished a firearm at them and went back into their apartment. After officers peacefully made contact with the subject, they discovered the caller actually made a false report to police. The caller was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. One of the occupants advised of a firearm in the vehicle. Officers located two illegally possessed firearms. The subject was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a grand theft from a business. Responding officers located the suspects and recovered approximately $3000 in merchandise. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of carjacking. The vehicle was located at another location unoccupied. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located a male adult with at least one gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital where he is currently in stable condition. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to a burglary in progress. Thanks to the assistance of one of our K-9 officers, the suspect was located inside of the building and arrested for burglary related charges.

location: Delta Shores Cir / Cosumnes River Blvd
text: Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver and located an illegally possessed firearm in the vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an assault. The air unit responded with officers and observed the suspect hide a firearm in the backyard prior to officers detaining him. Officers located the firearm, and the suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. The driver fled on foot and a foot pursuit ensued. The suspect was detained. A search of the suspect’s vehicle yielded an illegally possessed, loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges and outstanding warrants.

Officers responded to the area for reports of sounds of shots being fired. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting, but no property damage or injuries were observed. A report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a man with a gun. Responding officers located the suspect, who attempted to flee from officers on foot, but was taken into custody. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm that the suspect discarded. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a possible DUI driver. Officers attempted to stop the vehicle, but the suspect failed to yield and led officers on a slow-speed pursuit. The suspect was eventually detained and showed objective signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle. The vehicle failed to stop, and a pursuit ensued. The vehicle was eventually disabled after spike strips were deployed by officers. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers observed a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the occupants of the vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of sounds of shots fired in the area. No injuries were reported. Officers contacted a subject on scene and through investigation learned they were the suspect that fired a handgun. An illegally possessed firearm was located and seized, and the suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of possible domestic violence. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed rife, stolen handgun, magazines, and illicit drugs. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a subject stop of a known subject. The subject was detained and during a search, officers located an illegally possessed rifle. The subject was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle in the river. Officers and the fire department responded to the scene and located the solo occupant and driver of the vehicle. The driver was safely brought to land with assistance of officers and transported to an area hospital.
Officers stopped a subject believed to be a suspect of carjacking. While being arrested, the suspect fled from officers. A short foot pursuit ensued, and the suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers stopped a suspect who was actively breaking into parking meters. The suspect was combative with officers but was eventually detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of shots being fired. As officers arrived on scene, multiple subjects fled on foot and officers quickly set up a perimeter. Officers located a loaded handgun nearby as well as the suspects. No victims or property damage were reported. One of the suspects was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. A report was generated.
Officers were hailed regarding a robbery that just occurred. Officers located two juvenile suspects. The primary suspect was arrested and transported to juvenile hall for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a male who pointed a rifle at a friend and provided officers with a suspect description. Responding officers located the suspect, who was a juvenile, and the rifle. The suspect was arrested for related charges and taken to Juvenile Hall.
Officers located a suspect on a stolen motorcycle. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located over 54 expended casings. Fortunately, no injuries were reported. Officers processed the scene, conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers made a traffic stop. The driver was found to be a parolee and during the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers contacted subjects inside of a vehicle. At least one was found to be on probation. During the investigation, officers located indicia of drug sales including approximately $4000 cash, methamphetamine, fentanyl, and an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers contacted a subject, who discarded a loaded handgun. The suspect was detained, found to be 14-years-old and had an outstanding felony warrant. The suspect was arrested and taken to juvenile hall for related charges.

location: 3200 Block of Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd
text: Officers were hailed regarding an armed robbery to a business. Officers set up a perimeter around the area where the suspect was believed to be. The suspect refused to come out. Crisis Negotiators and an armored vehicle were brought out. Eventually, SWAT responded and the suspect surrendered. The suspect was arrested on numerous felony robbery and weapon charges.
Officers located a stolen motorcycle. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located a 26-year-old male and a 17-year-old male, both with at least one gunshot wound. Both victims were transported to an area hospital for treatment and are in stable condition. CSI responded to process the scene, officers conducted an investigation, and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located an adult male with at least one gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital and is in stable condition. CSI processed the scene, officers conducted an investigation, and a report was generated.

Officers responded to an alarm activation at a closed business. Responding officers located a suspect inside and detained him. Through the investigation, officers arrested the suspect on burglary related charges.

Officers stopped a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. The driver was found to be on parole and pre-trial supervision. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed loaded handgun. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area regarding reports of an argument between two groups of people where a gun was reportedly observed. Officers utilized the Public Safety Camera Network to obtain a better description of the individual with the gun. Officers located multiple individuals involved in the argument and recovered an illegally possessed firearm. Two suspects were arrested for related charges.

location: W El Camino Ave & Millcreek Dr
text: Offices attempted to conduct a traffic stop in the area. The vehicle failed to stop and a pursuit ensued. The pursuit ended in a muddy field by the vehicle getting stuck. Officers attempted to communicate with the driver for an extended period of time. Officers were able to utilize less lethal methods to safely take the driver into custody. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area regarding reports of a stolen vehicle. Responding officers located the stolen vehicle which failed to stop and a pursuit ensued. The suspect then fled on foot from the vehicle. A perimeter was quickly established and the suspect was located and arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. While waiting for a tow truck to respond to tow the vehicle, as the driver was unlicensed the passenger of the vehicle began acting suspicious. Officers conducted search of the subject and located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers attempted to stop it, however the vehicle failed to stop and a short pursuit ensued. Officers were able to locate and detain most of the suspects involved. The suspects were issued citations and one of the suspects was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested.

Officers responded to a single-vehicle collision involving a pedestrian. One adult female did succumb to her injuries from the collision. At this time, it appears the woman was in front of the vehicle, possibly working on the car, when it rolled forward and ran her over. Due to the circumstances, detectives from our Major Collision Investigation Unit (MCIU) and Crime Scene Investigators responded to take over the investigation. The Sacramento County Coroner’s Office will release the identity of the deceased after next-of-kin have been notified.

Officers serviced a search warrant at a residence after a juvenile suspect posted images with firearms. Officers located one illegally possessed firearm and ammunition. The juvenile suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. An investigation was conducted an a report was generated.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for a vehicle code violation The suspect failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. The suspect attempted to flee from the vehicle on foot and was caught. The suspect was found to have two outstanding felony warrants. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. The occupants of the vehicle were detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area regarding reports of sounds of shots being fired. Officers did not locate anyone with injuries or any property damage, but did locate casings on the ground in the area. A report was generated.

Officers observed a subject sleeping at the wheel of a running vehicle. Officers found the vehicle to be stolen. When officers woke the suspect up, he fled in the vehicle and a short pursuit ensued. The suspect then attempted to flee on foot but was quickly detained by officers. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area regarding reports of an armed robbery of a bobcat excavator. Officers located the bobcat at a nearby residence. During a search, officers also located an illegal firearm that was seized. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.
Officers responded to the area regarding reports of a stolen vehicle. Officers located the occupied stolen vehicle. The occupants were detained, and the driver was arrested for related charges.

During a sideshow, the air unit reported repeatedly having a laser pointed at it by the driver of a vehicle. The air unit directed ground units to the vehicle and a traffic stop was conducted. The laser device was located in the driver's possession. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers contacted multiple occupants of a suspicious vehicle. During a search of one of the juvenile occupants, officers located an illegally possessed loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested and booked at juvenile hall.

location: W. El Camino Ave & Grasslands Dr
text: Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver and arrested him for related charges.

Officers responded to the area for reports of a robbery. When officers located the suspect, he fled on foot and a brief foot pursuit ensued. Officers detained the suspect, and he was arrested for related charges
Officer located a stolen vehicle. Officers detained the driver who was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of sounds of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of subjects trespassing at a vacant residence. Officers contacted several subjects on scene, and through their investigation located a stolen vehicle, narcotics, ammunition, and an illegally possessed firearm. Two suspects were arrested for related charges.

location: North D St & Dos Rios St
text: Officers conducted a traffic stop for a vehicle code violation. Through investigation, the driver was found to be driving under the influence and on active parole. An illegally possessed firearm as well as narcotics were found in the driver's vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm inside of the vehicle. The driver was arrested and booked into Juvenile Hall on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located one victim with a non-life-threatening gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital for treatment. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a parking meter theft. Responding officers located the suspect, who was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers stopped a vehicle for a traffic violation. A passenger fled from the vehicle on foot and threw a firearm. The suspect was detained and the illegally possessed firearm was recovered. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a speeding vehicle. The driver failed to yield and a short pursuit ensued. The driver was detained and displayed objective signs of intoxication. The driver was arrested for related charges.

code: Welfare Check - Drug Sales & Firearm Arrest
text: Officers responded to a welfare check of a person slumped over in the driver seat of a vehicle. During the investigation, officers located narcotics, sales indicia, and an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver fled from the vehicle and climbed up a tree. The suspect was eventually detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to the area for reports of a stolen vehicle. Officers attempted to stop the vehicle, but it failed to stop, and a pursuit ensued. Officers were eventually able to stop the vehicle, and the driver was safely detained. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver and passenger were detained and arrested for stolen vehicle charges and outstanding warrants, respectively.

Officers were alerted of a stolen vehicle. With the assistance officers in our Real Time Information Center using the Public Safety Camera Network, officers located the occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of an RT Train vs. pedestrian collision. The pedestrian sustained minor injuries. A report was generated.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the occupants. Officers located narcotic paraphernalia in possession of the passenger, who was cited. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers located a suspicious vehicle associated with a recent felony assault. The vehicle fled from the area at a high rate of speed and a pursuit ensued. The vehicle was involved in a collision and the occupants fled on foot. Officers located the occupants, detained them, and located a loaded firearm. The suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a bicyclist for multiple traffic violations. The bicyclist failed to stop. Officers followed the suspect until he was detained. Officers stopped the suspect and located narcotic paraphernalia in their possession. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an assault involving a firearm being pointed at the victim. Officers located the suspect and the firearm they pointed at the victim. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of sounds of shots being fired. On scene, officers located evidence of a shooting, but no reported injuries. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a missing person. Officer learned an elderly woman with dementia went missing on January 28. Officers conducted an investigation and missing person information was broadcasted.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a known suspect, for a traffic violation. The suspect did not stop and a pursuit ensued. The suspect and passenger then fled from the vehicle on foot but were quickly and safely detained by officers. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of sounds of shots being fired. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting, but no reported victims. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of someone swinging a crowbar and making threats. The suspect fled from the scene prior to the officers’ arrival but was located in the area. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a subject with a handgun in the area. Responding officers located the suspect who was detained safely. Officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop in the area. The vehicle did not stop, and a pursuit ensued. A passenger of the vehicle fled on foot. The driver and other passengers remained in the vehicle when it stopped. Officers were unable to locate the passenger that fled. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a sideshow. Responding officers arrived as CHP was dispersing the crowd. There were no additional sideshows reported.
