Officers responded to a report of someone who shattered a glass door of a business. Responding officers arrived on scene and the suspect fled on foot from them. Officers safely detained the suspect, and they were arrested for related charges and outstanding warrants.

Officers observed a suspicious subject near broken parking meters. Officers located a significant amount of change on the suspect. The suspect was arrested for their outstanding warrants and related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers conducted a vehicle stop and detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of sounds of shots being fired. Officers located evidence of a shooting, but no reported injuries. An investigation was conducted, and report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of sounds of shots being fired. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting, but no reported injured victims. An investigation was conducted and a report generated.

Officers responded to reports of sounds of shots being fired. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting, but no reported injured victims. An investigation was conducted and a report generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

location: Northview Dr / W. El Camino Ave
text: Officers contacted individuals inside of a vehicle, but the occupants fled from the vehicle on foot. One of the occupants discarded a firearm while fleeing. The firearm was recovered and was found to be loaded and was reported stolen. After a perimeter was set and with the assistance of our UAS and K-9 teams, the suspect was detained and arrested on related charges.

Officers located an unoccupied stolen U-Haul truck. This truck was involved in a pursuit with an outside agency about an hour earlier, but managed to get away. Inside of the truck, officers located identity theft related evidence which was collected and booked as evidence. This investigation is ongoing.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle who drove past them at a high rate of speed. The driver failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. The vehicle eventually stopped and the driver was detained and arrested for felony pursuit charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of an adult son who robbed his elderly parents by force. The suspect was arrested on robbery and elder abuse related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver, a juvenile, was detained and arrested for related charges. The suspect was booked into juvenile hall.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. The suspect failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. With the assistance of an outside agency, the suspect was detained. The suspect was found to be a parolee-at-large and our officers booked him on related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle. The driver failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. The driver couldn’t maneuver a turn and came to rest near a light pole. The driver was detained and a record check of the vehicle showed that it was just stolen a few minutes prior to our officers attempting to stop it. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop of a motorcycle for a vehicle code violation. During the stop officers learned the rider had an illegally possessed loaded firearm, narcotics, and an outstanding felony warrant. The suspect was arrested for related charges and their warrant.

Officers responded to an incomplete call to 911 at this location. During the investigation, officers learned of firearms inside of a vehicle on scene.  Officers detained the suspects and located two illegally possessed loaded firearms inside of the vehicle.  The suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle for traffic violations. During officer’s investigation, the driver became uncooperative, and an illegally possessed firearm was located in his possession. The driver was arrested for related charges.

An 8-year-old victim was riding his bicycle. A 13-year-old suspect approached the victim and pulled out a knife and stole the victim’s bicycle. Good Samaritans stepped in and assisted the victim, while others held onto the suspect until officers arrived. The suspect was arrested and booked into Juvenile Hall.

Officers responded to reports of a carjacking at gunpoint. The suspect(s) fled prior to police arrival. Responding officers conducted a thorough investigation. The victim was not injured during this incident. A report was generated.
Officers responded to the fire department's request to investigate an unoccupied vehicle in the water. The vehicle was found to be stolen. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.
Officers responded to a report of a vehicle that drove across Haggin Oaks Golf. The driver was found to be driving under the influence. Officers arrested the driver for related charges.

A Community Service Officer (CSO) responded to a reports of a burglary and conducted an investigation. The CSO observed a person matching the description of the suspect standing nearby. Patrol officers responded and detained the suspect, who was eventually arrested for burglary related charges.

Officers located a vehicle from another call. When officers attempted to stop it, the vehicle fled and led officers on a pursuit. The driver eventually yielded to officers and was taken into custody. The suspect displayed objective signs of intoxication and was arrested for pursuit and DUI related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery by physical force to a person. A nearby motor officer located the suspect in the area and detained him. After a thorough investigation, the suspect was arrested for robbery related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. Thanks to the assistance of air support and K9, the suspect was apprehended and booked on related charges.

A patrol sergeant heard sounds of shots fired and began to investigate. As he did so, a vehicle attempted to flee and a traffic stop was initiated. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed rifle inside of the vehicle and evidence of a shooting. The suspect had felony warrants and was booked on related charges.

Officers contacted a subject on probation who was inside of a vehicle. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed loaded firearm inside. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. The suspect failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. The suspect collided into another vehicle and attempted to flee on foot, but was quickly apprehended. During the investigation, officers learned that the vehicle was stolen. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a suspicious object tied to a power pole. Our Explosive Ordinance Disposal (EOD) unit responded and determined the object to not be an explosive device and safely disposed of it.
Officers responded to reports of sounds of shots fired. Officers located evidence of a shooting but no reported injuries or property damage. An investigation was conducted and a report generated.

Officers stopped a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. The driver attempted to flee but was quickly apprehended. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers contacted two subjects and during the investigation, located an illegally possessed firearm and narcotics. The suspects were arrested for related charges.

location: State University Dr / Bay Laurel Wy
text: Officers responded to reports of a robbery to a person by force. Responding officers located the suspect, who was arrested after a thorough investigation. The victim was not injured.

Patrol officers observed a male subject exit and walk away from a vehicle as they were approaching. Officers ran the license plate of the vehicle and in plain view, observed narcotic paraphernalia. Officers began searching the area, located the subject who walked away from the vehicle, and detained him. Upon further investigation, officers located an illegally possessed loaded handgun, shotgun, ammunition, composite knuckles, and several 3D printed firearm parts inside of the vehicle. The suspect, who was a convicted felon, was arrested on related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle at this location. The driver failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. The air unit was overhead and assisted ground units with the pursuit. The suspect eventually pulled over and surrendered near the 5900 block of Stockton Blvd. He was arrested on felony pursuit charges and a parole violation.

Officers conducted a vehicle stop and the driver and passenger were both found to be on probation. During the investigation, officers located live ammunition near the passenger, who was a prohibited from possessing ammunition. The passenger was arrested for ‘felon in possession of ammunition’ charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers from our agency, as well as CHP responded. Officers located two victims, one 17-year-old and one 18-year-old, both with at least one gunshot wound. Both victims were transported to area hospitals for treatment. The 17-year-old remains in critical condition, while the 18-year-old victim is listed in stable condition. Two suspects were located and have been arrested. This remains an active investigation.

Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. The driver fled from the vehicle on foot. Officers located the suspect nearby and detained him safely. The suspect was found to have outstanding warrants and was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an assault involving a deadly weapon. Responding officers located the suspect retreating back into his residence and refusing to come out. After hours of negotiations between the suspect and Crisis Negotiation Team officers, the suspect peacefully surrendered and was taken into custody. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a robbery to a person by force. Responding officers located the fleeing suspect and took him into custody. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. It was determined that the suspect was in the backyard of a residence. As officers set up a perimeter, the suspect surrendered and was safely detained. During the investigation, officers located the firearm. No injuries were reported. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a stolen vehicle in progress. Nearby officers located the occupied stolen vehicle and attempted to stop it. The driver failed to yield and led officers on a slow-speed pursuit. A Pursuit Immobilization Technique was successfully used and the suspect was arrested related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to the location for reports of several juveniles that were involved in a fight. Officers arrived on scene and through investigation established a robbery had occurred, with one victim who had sustained injuries from the incident. Our officers working in the Real Time Information Center (RTIC) had a fast response and were able to utilize cameras in the area, in order to locate the suspects that had fled the scene. Officers quickly  located, and detained the suspects involved in the robbery. The suspects were arrested and booked in Juvenile Hall for related charges.

Officers responded to the area for reports of a shooting. Air support was in the area and located a group of individuals walking away from the area. Officers responded to the group and detained them without incident. Officers located a loaded firearm, and the suspect was arrested for related charges. No injuries were reported.

Officers were conducting proactive patrol within the area, when they observed a vehicle burglary in progress. Upon the arrival of officers, the suspects fled away from an associated vehicle, that was found to be reported stolen. Officers established a perimeter and a suspect was located nearby. The suspect was detained and booked for related charges.

Officers responded to the location for reports that a victim was assaulted and a robbery had occurred. The victim was able to provide responding officers with a vehicle and suspect descriptions. Officers were able to quickly locate the suspect vehicle at a nearby residence. Officers established a perimeter and were able to locate 2 suspects, along with the victims personal property. The suspects were arrested and booked on related charges.

Officers responded to the area for reports of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located signs that a shooting had occurred. No victims were reported or located on scene. The investigation is pending at this time.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located a victim on scene and rendered medical aid. The victim was transported to an area hospital for non-life-threatening injuries. Officers also located the suspect and firearm used on scene. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a stop of a subject riding a bicycle. The suspect attempted to flee from officers but was quickly detained. Officers located an illegal firearm in the suspect's possession. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a stop of a group of individuals in the area. Officers located an illegally possessed firearm in one of the suspect's possessions. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle, but it failed to stop. A short pursuit ensued until the suspect pulled the vehicle over. The suspect was safely detained. Officers arrested the suspect for an outstanding warrant and related charges.

Officers responded to reports of subjects breaking into parking meters. Responding officers quickly detained one suspect. The second suspect attempted to flee on a bicycle but was located a short distance away and successfully detained. Both suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting but no reported injuries. A report was generated, and an investigation is pending at this time.

location: Light Sky Ct & Younger Creek Dr
text: Officers responded to the area for reports of a vehicle sideshow. Officers conducted a traffic stop of one of the primary vehicles involved and detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. During their investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The driver of the vehicle was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to sounds of possible shots being fired in the area. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting but no reported injuries. A report was generated, and an investigation is pending at this time.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver of the vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. During the investigation, officers located an illegal firearm and ammunition in the driver's possession. The driver was arrested for related charges.

location: W El Camino Ave & Azevedo Dr
text: Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm and ammunition. The driver was arrested for related charges.

code: Subject Stop - Firearm and Drug Arrest
text: Officers conducted a bicycle stop of a subject. During the stop, officers located an illegally possessed firearm and narcotics in the suspect's possession. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle that was recently involved in a pursuit. The driver fled on foot but was caught by officers and detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a suspect of a robbery in a vehicle and a traffic stop was conducted. After a thorough investigation, the suspect was arrested for the robbery and booked into the Sacramento County Main Jail.

Officers received reports of a victim who was threatened with a knife. Responding officers located the vehicle and safely detained the suspect. An illegally possessed firearm was located. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver fled form the vehicle, but wasn’t faster than one of our officers. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.

Patrol Officers working in the area observed a vehicle occupied by a subject wanted in relation to an attempted armed robbery and assault with a deadly weapon. The officers requested additional resources including a K9 and an Air unit.  While resources were arriving the suspect began to drive away.  Officers conducted a vehicle stop on the suspect and he was and arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to the area for reports of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located evidence that a shooting had occurred. No injuries were reported for this incident. This is an active investigation.

Officers responded to reports that a suspect brandished a knife to a Regional Transit employee. Officers responded to the station and contacted the involved suspect and detained him without incident. The suspect was arrested and booked for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. Responding officers located an adult victim with at least one non-life-threatening stab wound. The suspect was located and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. Responding officers located an adult male victim with at least one stab wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital and was in critical condition. Officers were diligent and located two suspects and both were arrested for related charges.

location: 3000 Block of Martin Luther King, Jr. Blvd
text: Officers responded to the area for reports of a shooting. Officers arrived on scene and observed signs of a shooting. All involved parties had fled the scene. There were no reported injuries, and this is an active investigation.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The occupants were detained. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of about 5 subjects in an apartment complex with ski-masks. An air unit responded first and the subjects began fleeing. Ground officers were able to detain all the subjects and during the investigation, officers located several illegally possessed firearms and narcotics. The suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded the area for reports of a shooting. Officers conducted an investigation and observed signs that a shooting had occurred. No injuries were reported. This is an active investigation.
Officers stopped a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed stolen vehicle and narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of sounds of shots being fired. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting but no reported injuries. A report was generated, this is an active investigation.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery with a weapon. There were no reported injuries, however, officers were able to quickly locate the suspect in the area and detain him. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area for an alarm activation at a business with video footage of a subject inside. Responding officers arrived, located the suspect and detained him. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area for reports of a shooting. The victim was able to safely exit the residence and officers detained the suspect. Officers located an illegal firearm, and the suspect was arrested for related charges.

location: Power Inn Rd & Elder Creek Rd
text: Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. During the investigation, officers located two illegally possessed firearms. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting.  No injuries were reported. Responding officers located multiple subjects and an associated vehicle in the area. Through investigation, officers located two discarded firearms near the vehicle. The associated suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a subject with a firearm in a parking lot. Through investigation, officers determined two suspects, one armed with a firearm, assaulted two victims. No serious injuries were reported. The suspects were detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a fight in front of a bar. Officers observed a suspect punch a security guard in the face. When officers went in to detain the suspect, a second suspect punched the officer in the face. Both suspects were arrested on battery charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. An investigation was conducted and report generated.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery. Officers quickly arrived on scene and detained several individuals. Utilizing cameras from the Public Safety Camera Network, officers identified the suspect and arrested them for related charges.

Officers were in the area and attempted to contact a subject who was on foot. The suspect fled and officers detained them a short distance away. The suspect was arrested for their outstanding warrants and related charges.

Officers were in the area when they were contacted about someone with a firearm. During their investigation, officers learned the suspect with the firearm was disarmed by another subject who provided officers with the illegally possessed firearm. Officers located the suspect, and they were arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers were patrolling the area when they observed a vehicle commit a traffic violation. Officers conducted a traffic stop. Officers observed objective signs of intoxication in the driver. During their investigation, officers also located an illegally possessed firearm. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Responding officers located the suspect driver who attempted to flee on foot but was quickly detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop an ATV for traffic violations. The driver of the ATV did not stop and a pursuit ensued. The suspect eventually stopped. The ATV was found to be stolen. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle collision in the area. Responding officers determined this was a hit and run collision with occupants of the suspect vehicle fleeing the scene prior to officers’ arrival. No serious injuries were reported. Traffic was impacted while officers investigated and processed the scene. A report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested on related charges.

Officers observed a suspect wanted from a robbery. When officers attempted to detain the suspect, the suspect attempted to flee on foot. Officers detained and arrested the suspect for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for reckless driving. The driver failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. The suspect eventually pulled over but still refused to exit the car. The suspect was eventually detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports that a suspect hit a victim with a metal pole. Responding officers located the suspect and detained him. After a thorough investigation, the suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a carjacking by physical force. The victim sustained non-life-threatening injuries. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of potentially armed individuals. Responding officers located the suspects and detained them. While doing so, officers located an illegally possessed stolen handgun in the waistband of one of the suspects. That suspect was a juvenile, and was arrested and booked into Juvenile Hall for related charges.
Officers observed a suspect that was involved in a previous burglary. The suspect was detained and arrested for burglary related charges, as well a PRCS hold.
Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. Officers located illegally possessed firearms in the possession of both occupants of the vehicle. Both suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area for reports of an assault. Responding officers located the suspect attempting to flee from the backdoor of the victim’s residence. Officers detained the suspect and located an illegally possessed firearm in the suspect’s possession. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of sounds of shots being fired. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting but no reported victims. Officers conducted an investigation on scene and a report was generated.

Officers located a sideshow in the area and organized a coordinated response to address it. Officers on scene made numerous traffic stops, towed a vehicle, and issued several citations. Two suspects on scene were also arrested for their outstanding warrants.

Officers responded to the area for a possible sideshow. Responding officers located several vehicles in the area that dispersed upon their arrival. Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of one of the vehicles. The vehicle did not stop, and a short pursuit ensued. The vehicle eventually stopped on its own and the driver was taken into custody.

Officers responded to reports of a suspect armed with a handgun in the area. Responding officers located the suspect who attempted to flee from them on foot and discarded the firearm. Officers were able to detain the suspect and recover the firearm which had been reported stolen. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. During the stop, officers observed a volume of items appearing to be recently stolen. During the traffic stop, a call of a ringing alarm in the area was broadcasted. Additional officers responded to the alarm and observed a recent burglary occurred. After a thorough investigation, it was determined the occupants of the vehicle were involved in the recent burglary. The suspects were taken into custody.

location: West El Camino Ave & Truxel Rd
text: Officers responded to a report of juveniles who stole a golf cart. Responding officers quickly located the driver who had an outstanding warrant. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle and attempted to conduct a traffic stop. The vehicle did not stop and a pursuit ensued. The driver eventually fled on foot from the vehicle. Additional responding officers located the fleeing suspect and detained him. The suspect was a juvenile on probation. He was booked at juvenile hall for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a subject who was stabbed. Responding officers located a victim with non-life-threatening stab wounds, on scene. A short time later, the suspect who stabbed the victim was reported to be back on scene. Officers responded back to the scene, located the suspect and arrested the suspect for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

location: Fruitridge Rd / Martin Luther King Kr. Blvd
text: Officers stopped a vehicle. A probation search was conducted and during the investigation, officers located cash and several baggies of narcotics. The driver was arrested on drug charges and the passenger was arrested for a felony warrant.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. The driver failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. The driver and passenger eventually fled from the vehicle on foot. Officers set up a perimeter and with the assistance of our K-9 unit, the driver was located and detained. The driver, a 16-year-old male, was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a motorcycle. The rider failed to yield and led officers on pursuit. An air unit assisted ground units and directed them to the rider, who attempted to abandon the motorcycle. The rider was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. An adult male and juvenile male were both transported to area hospitals with stab wounds and are both in stable condition. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a sideshow in the area. Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of one of the vehicles involved in the sideshow. The vehicle did not stop, and a pursuit ensued. The driver eventually stopped and was found to be in possession of an illegally possessed firearm. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. The victim sustained a non-life-threatening injury. The suspect was located and arrested for felony assault charges.

Officers responded to reports of a man sleeping outside with a gun on him. Responding officers located the suspect and safely detained him. The suspect was prohibited from possessing firearms and was arrested for related charges.

location: 900 Block of W. El Camino Ave
text: Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located two adult males with at least one gunshot wound each. Both were transported to area hospitals where they are listed in stable condition. A police helicopter arrived and located a suspect vehicle leaving the scene. Officers eventually detained the suspect and this investigation is ongoing.

Officers responded to reports of a person in a store with a gun in his waistband. That suspect entered a vehicle and prepared to leave when officers stopped the car with two occupants inside. During the investigation, two illegally possessed firearms were located. Both occupants were arrested for multiple related charges.

Officers attempted to contact a known probationer. The suspect fled from officers on foot and tossed a firearm. Officers located the suspect and detained him. The suspect was arrested and taken to Juvenile Hall.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle. The driver failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. The driver eventually pulled over and two passengers fled from the car on foot. The driver was detained. During the investigation, officers located a rifle in the vehicle. With the assistance of patrol, Air, and K-9, one of the passengers was located. A loaded handgun was located. The driver and passenger were arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No gunshot victims were located. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a burglary in progress. Officers set up a perimeter around the business and while making announcements, the suspect attempted to flee out the back door. The suspect was arrested and booked on related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located two victims, both with non-life-threatening gunshot wounds. Both victims were bystanders and went to area hospitals for treatment. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded for a subject down in the roadway. Officers arrived and administered Narcan, eventually reviving the subject. The fire department arrived and transported the subject to an area hospital.

Officers responded to reports of a large group of juveniles fighting in the area. Preliminary information suggested someone was possibly stabbed. Responding officers determined no one was stabbed but was hit with a chair. The victim was transported to an area hospital for minor injuries.

Officers observed a vehicle driving recklessly and attempted to conduct a traffic stop. The driver did not stop and fled at a high rate of speed.  After a short vehicle pursuit, the suspect vehicle pulled over. The suspect driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a suspect who had stolen from a business. Responding officers located the suspect and attempted to detain him. The suspect was uncooperative and additional officers responded to assist. Officers safely detained the suspect who was arrested for related charges.
Officers attempted to stop a subject smoking marijuana in the area. The subject became uncooperative and resisted officers but was safely detained. The subject was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a subject refusing to leave a business. Upon officers' arrival, the suspect exited the store and attempted to take one of the officers’ bikes. Officers detained the suspect who was intoxicated. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a call of a subject who brandished a handgun at a victim. Although officers were unable to locate a firearm, they contacted multiple witnesses who advised of the brandishing. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a bicycle stop. The suspect did not stop and fled on the bike onto the freeway where he eventually stopped. Officers detained the suspect who was arrested for related charges and an outstanding warrant.

Officers observed a robbery suspect in the area and attempted to detain him. The suspect attempted to flee but was quickly detained. Officers located an illegally possessed loaded firearm on the suspect. An additional person that accompanied the suspect was also a suspect of the robbery. Both suspects were transported to juvenile hall.

Officers conducted a traffic stop. During the officers’ search an illegally possessed firearm was located in possession of one of the occupants of the vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting but no report injuries. An investigation was conducted and a report was generated.

Officers investigated a robbery between juveniles in the area. Officers located the suspect who attempted to flee on foot, sustaining a minor injury. Officers safely detained the suspect who will be transported to juvenile hall after being medically cleared from the hospital.
Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle in the area. During a search, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect with the firearm was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a bicycle stop on the area. The cyclist did not stop and a short bike and then subsequent foot pursuit ensued. Officers were able to safely detain the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a bicycle stop in the area. The cyclist initially stopped but then decided to flee on their bike. A short pursuit ensued until the suspect was safely detained. Officers found the suspect to be on PRCS and to be in possession of narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a subject on an e-scooter. The suspect did not stop on fled on the scooter. Officers located the suspect a shot distance away with the help of the Air Unit. The suspect was safely detained and arrested for his outstanding warrants and related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an armed robbery of a person. Detectives in our Real Time Information Center (RTIC) worked alongside patrol officers to help locate the suspect vehicle. The vehicle was stopped and the occupants of the vehicle were detained. During the investigation, officers located two illegally possessed firearms. The suspects were arrested on related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a vehicle vs. motorcycle collision. The motorcyclist was pronounced deceased on the way to the hospital. The driver remained on scene and cooperated with the investigation. Detectives from our Major Collision Investigation Unit and Crime Scene Investigators responded to take over the investigation.

Officers responded to reports of a man with a gun. Responding officers located the suspect and detained him. He was found to be on probation and was prohibited from possessing a firearm. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

location: Norbert Wy / W. El Camino Ave
text: Officers contacted a probationer in a vehicle. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed sawed-off shotgun. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. A victim with a non-life-threatening injury self-transported to an area hospital and was contacted by police. An investigation was conducted and a report generated.

Officers stopped a vehicle. Two occupants fled from the vehicle on foot. One of the occupants attempted to discard a firearm. One of the suspects was located near the firearm and was detained. The other suspect was not located. The suspect detained was arrested for resisting and firearm related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. One adult male was located on scene with at least one gunshot wound. He was transported to an area hospital and is in stable condition. The suspect returned to the scene and was detained by officers. During the investigation, officers located a handgun. The suspect was arrested on attempted murder charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. The driver fled on foot from the vehicle when officers located it. Officers were quickly able to establish a perimeter and locate the suspect. He was arrested for relate charges.

Officers responded to a report of a person who fell victim to a telephone scam leading him to provide suspects with a large sum of money. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to a missing person report. A social media blast was posted online. The missing person has been safely located.
Officers responded to a multiple vehicle collision involving a semi-truck that blocked traffic for approximately 45 minutes until it was cleared.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting and a victim with a non-life-threatening gunshot wound to his hand. That victim was transported to an area hospital. Later in the evening, a second victim with a non-life-threatening gunshot wound showed up at an area hospital and was treated. Based on the investigation, officers believe the victim was shot at this scene. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a man who brandished a firearm. With the assistance of onsite security, officers responded, located the suspect, and detained him. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. A report was generated.

location: 4000 Block of Martin Luther King, Jr. Blvd
text: Officers responded to a report of a disturbance. When officers arrived, the suspect threw two glass bottles at officers and threatened to kill them. Less-lethal weapons were used to detain the suspect, who was arrested on numerous charges.

location: Clover Hill Ct / Whisper Wood Wy
text: Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. The driver failed to yield and led officers on pursuit. The driver eventually pulled over, was detained, and displayed objective signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported on scene. An investigation was complete and officers wrote a report.

Officers responded to reports of a subject who negligently fired a firearm into the air. Officers learned the suspect who fired the gun was likely located in a nearby residence and established a perimeter. After hours of negotiating with the suspect to surrender, SWAT and additional negotiators arrived to the scene. The suspect peacefully surrendered a short time later and was arrested for his outstanding warrant and related charges. A search of the property yielded a firearm.

Officers responded for reports of domestic violence. Through investigation, officers determined the suspect to have committed felony domestic violence. As officers attempted to detain the suspect, he fled on foot. Officers quickly established a perimeter and located the suspect hiding in a nearby canal, and detained him peacefully. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of sounds of shots being fired on the area. Officers located evidence of a shooting but no reported victims. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

location: Rio Linda Blvd & El Camino Ave
text: Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. The vehicle immediately fled, eventually stopped, and all occupants fled the vehicle on foot. A loaded firearm was located on the ground near the vehicle. Despite a perimeter being established, the suspects were not located. A report was generated for follow up.

Officers responded to a burglary alarm. Responding officers located evidence of a burglary. With the assistance of a partnering agency’s K9, officers located two suspects hiding inside the building. The suspects were detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a hit and run collision involving a vehicle and bicyclist. The bicyclist was transported to an area hospital in critical condition; the driver of the vehicle fled the scene prior to police arrival. Major Collision Investigation Unit detectives responded to take over the investigation. Through diligent and extensive follow up, detectives identified, located, and arrested the hit and run driver for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a dirt bike. The rider of the dirt bike failed to stop, and a pursuit ensued. Officers eventually lost sight of the dirt bike and ended the pursuit. A report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a subject with a firearm. Officers responded quickly to the area and located an individual matching the subject’s description and safely detained him. Officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle occupied by three subjects. After stopping initially, the suspect vehicle fled, and a pursuit ensued. During the pursuit, the suspect vehicle left the roadway and collided into a power pole and unoccupied vehicles. The driver attempted to flee on foot but was apprehended a short distance away. One passenger remained on scene and the other one fled. The driver was arrested for DUI and related charges. The two occupants of the vehicle that remained on scene sustained non-life-threatening injuries.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery. Officers located the suspect on scene and detained her safely. The suspect was on probation for organized retail theft. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a theft. Officers quickly contacted the suspect who became resistive with them. Officers were able to safely detain the suspect, and he was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery of a person by physical force. Responding officers were able to locate and detain the suspects. The victim sustained minor injuries and the suspects were booked into jail on robbery related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a reckless driver. The suspect failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. Officers canceled the pursuit, but located the vehicle parked. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

A 12-year-old victim was approached by two adult suspects who pointed a rifle at him and took his bulldog. The victim was not physically injured. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to sounds of shots fired. Through their investigation, officers determined a kid’s swim party was taking place and a drunk male in attendance discharged a firearm as part of the party events. Officers seized the firearm and the suspect was arrested for discharging a firearm and child endangerment.

Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. Two victims were located, one who was in critical condition. Both victims were transported to area hospitals and both have stabilized. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle collision. One party was pronounced deceased on scene. The other party remained on scene and cooperated with law enforcement. DUI does not appear to be a factor. Detectives responded out to take over the investigation.
Officers initiated a traffic stop. One of the occupants was a convicted felon and was in possession of an illegally possessed handgun. The felon was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a subject trying to enter an apartment. Officers arrived on scene and quickly located the suspect. The suspect was resistive during officers' attempt to detain her; however, she was safely detained. The suspect was arrest for possession of narcotics and related charges.

location: Light Sky Ct & Younger Creek Dr
text: Officers responded to over 50 vehicles gathered for sideshow activity in the area. Officers conducted enforcement action including issuing citations and towing a vehicle. The remaining group of vehicles eventually dispersed and left the area.

Officers responded to reports of an assault involving a firearm. Responding officers located two victims, neither victim sustained gunshot wounds, however they did have non-life-threatening injuries. The victims were transported to an area hospital. Officers recovered a firearm from the scene. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.

Officers responded to a disturbance involving a firearm at a residence. While officers were on scene, the suspect with the alleged firearm was located walking out of the residence and was detained by officers. A search yielded two illegally possessed firearms. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a subject exposing themselves and waiving a stick at people. Responding officers detained the suspect who was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of sounds of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting but no reported injuries. An investigation was conducted and a report generated.

Officers responded to reports of a subject looking into vehicles with a knife in her hand. Responding officers located the suspect who was resistive and kicked one of the officers when they detained her. Officers identified the suspect who had an outstanding felony warrant. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

location: Cliff House Wy & Painted Ocean Pl
text: Officers responded to a report of a subject who threatened to pistol whip the caller. Responding officers located the suspect who had an illegally possessed firearm. Officers safely detained the suspect and located illegal drugs in their possession as well. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a suspicious subject who appeared to be preparing to rob a convenience store. Officers utilized FUSUS to assist in locating the suspect. Officers conducted a traffic stop of the suspect and located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a missing 82-year-old woman with dementia who went missing around 3:00am on 5/14/2025. Officers conducted an investigation and generated a report. A media blast was published with the missing person information.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery where the suspect simulated having a weapon. The suspect stole a juvenile's backpack and belongings. The suspect was not located. An investigation was conducted and a report generated.

Officers responded to reports of a large group of juveniles with guns in the area. The air unit and officers utilizing the Public Safety Camera Network assisted in the response and guided responding ground units to the group until they were able to detain suspects and investigate. Officers located multiple handguns and a rifle that had been discarded. Based on information from the air unit and officers utilizing the Public Safety Camera Network, officers were able to connect the illegally possessed firearms to the detained suspects. The suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a stolen vehicle. Responding officers located the vehicle occupied and attempted to stop it. The suspect failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit to Business 80 and Exposition Blvd. All three occupants were juveniles. The driver was arrested for stolen vehicle charges and was booked into Juvenile Hall. The other two  juveniles were returned to the Children’s Home.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a suspect armed with a rifle get into a vehicle. Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of the vehicle. The vehicle did not stop, and a pursuit ensued. The vehicle pursuit ended, and the occupants fled on foot, attempting to discard the rifle. Officers located two of the occupants and recovered two illegally possessed firearms from the scene. The male suspect was booked into juvenile hall, and the female suspect was booked into jail on related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle. During the stop, the passenger fled but was apprehended a short distance away. Officers discovered three additional occupants also fled from the vehicle. A rifle and handgun were located in the vehicle. The passenger was booked at juvenile hall for related charges and outstanding felony warrants.

Officers contacted the driver of a suspicious vehicle. During the encounter, the driver became uncooperative and was detained. Officers located an illegal firearm in the vehicle. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of domestic violence where the suspect assaulted the victim and pointed a firearm at him. Responding officers created a perimeter around where the possibly armed suspect was believed to be. Officers located the suspect and safely detained him. Officers located a rifle nearby. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle and located a stolen firearm. The driver who was on probation, was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded for reports of a large house party and someone armed with a gun. As officers arrived on scene they heard multiple gunshots and observed people fleeing the area. Officers locate a male adult victim with at least one gunshot wound. The male was transported to an area hospital for non life threatening injuries. Officers located casings, two vehicles and two residences that were struck by gun fire. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a carjacking. The suspect entered the victim’s vehicle and pushed the victim out. The suspect fled in the victim’s vehicle. The vehicle was entered into the stolen vehicle system and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a man who pointed a gun at a victim on a Light Rail Train. Officers worked with our Real Time Information Center to coordinate a response and locate the suspect. The suspect was detained and a handgun was recovered. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers did not locate any evidence of a shooting and no injured people were located.

location: 1500 Block of W. El Camino Ave
text: Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located a female adult with at least one gunshot wound. She was transported to an area hospital for treatment, where she remains in stable condition. There is no suspect information to release and officers completed a report.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a domestic violence incident where the suspect returned with a firearm. Responding officers were able to safely detain the suspect and during the investigation, located an illegally possessed loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a burglary in progress. Responding officers located the suspect exiting the residence. The suspect was detained and transported to an area hospital for a pre-existing injury, before being booked into jail for burglary-related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located one male adult victim with at least one gunshot wound. Officers rendered emergency medical aid to the victim, who was transported to an area hospital in stable condition. There is no suspect information to release at this time. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. The victim was transported to an area hospital with non-life-threatening injuries. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a male suspect outside with a firearm. Officers arrived on scene and detained the suspect. Officers located an illegally possessed firearm on the suspect’s person. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. The vehicle immediately fled from officers and a pursuit ensued. The vehicle eventually stopped in an apartment complex and the drive fled on foot. Officers located the suspect, and he was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a victim who was stabbed. The victim sustained non life threatening injuries and was transported to an area hospital. Officers located the suspect nearby and he was arrested for related charges.

Officers were advised of a possible arson suspect in the area. Officers observed the suspect and attempted to contact him. The suspect fled on foot but was eventually detained by officers. The suspect was identified as having multiple outstanding felony warrants. The suspect was arrested for his warrants and for fleeing from officers. Arson investigators responded and conducted an investigation. Additional charges may be added if applicable.

Officers responded to the area for reports of sounds of shots being fired. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting but no victims were reported. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.

location: Martin Luther King Jr Blvd & 26th Ave
text: Officers were hailed by a victim who advised their vehicle was stolen. The victim was able to provide officers with updated locations of her vehicle. Officers broadcasted this information over the radio and additional officers were able to locate the vehicle and detain the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of vehicle but the vehicle did not stop and a short pursuit ensued. The driver eventually pulled over and was detained. Through officers investigation, they determined the suspect driver to be DUI. The suspect also kicked an officer. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a theft. The victim advised he consented to receiving a hug from two suspects who were not know to him. Eventually, the victim realized the suspects had stolen his gold necklace. An investigation was conducted and a report generated.

Officers responded to a report of someone who was stabbed. Responding officers located the suspect and victim on scene. The victim sustained non-life-threatening injuries and was transported to an area hospital. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a burglary. Responding officers located evidence of a burglary. Officers located the suspect nearby and as they attempted to detain, he briefly attempted to flee from officers on foot, but was taken into custody. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported and we do not have any suspect information to release at this time. A report was generated.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle. The vehicle did not stop and a short pursuit ensued. The occupants fled on foot and a large perimeter was established in the area. The driver and a passenger were located and detained. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop. The vehicle did not stop, and a pursuit ensued. The driver threw a large quantity of drugs out of the window and pulled the vehicle over shortly after. The driver and passenger of the vehicle were detained. The driver was arrested for pursuit related charges, and the passenger was arrested for an outstanding felony warrant.

Officers responded to the area for a report of a suspect who stole merchandise and attacked the victim with a sign. Officers located the suspect and detained her. The suspect was arrested for robbery and vandalism related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop; however, the suspect vehicle did not stop, and the vehicle fled. Officers canceled their pursuit of the vehicle, but from a distance observed it crash. Once officers arrived at the scene of the collision, they found the suspect vehicle was empty and had caught on fire. One suspect was quickly detained nearby; however, two additional outstanding suspects who fled from the vehicle were not located after a search of the area. A report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery of a person. The victim attempted to pursue the suspect, who turned around and pointed a firearm at him. A stolen firearm was located during the investigation, but the suspects were not. A report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a grand theft from a business. Responding officers located two of the suspects and were able to detain them. Suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. A male victim with at least one non-life-threatening gunshot wound was located. He was transported to an area hospital for treatment. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. CHP’s Airplane was overhead and assisted us in locating a fleeing suspect vehicle and ground units stopped the vehicle. During the investigation, 2 handguns and 2 rifles were located. Later, a victim arrived at an area hospital with at least one gunshot wound. That victim was taken into surgery for treatment. In total, 5 suspects were arrested.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. Later, a male victim arrived at an area hospital with a non-life-threatening gunshot wound. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located a female adult with at least one non-life-threatening gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital for treatment. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers located an unoccupied carjacking vehicle from the county. Officers conducted a high risk stop and detained the driver who was the carjacking suspect. During a search of the vehicle, an imitation firearm was located. Deputies took custody of the suspect.

code: Traffic Stop - Drug and Firearm Arrest
text: Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. During a search, officers located drugs and an illegal firearm. Both occupants of the vehicle were arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a subject on an electric scooter for a traffic offense. The subject on the scooter did not stop and officers pursued him. Officers were eventually able to detain the suspect, and he was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of sounds of shots being fired in the area. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting, but no reported victims. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers conducted a high-risk stop of the vehicle and detained the suspect driver. The driver was arrested for the stolen vehicle and his outstanding felony warrants.
Officers located a stolen vehicle related to a burglary. Officers safely detained the driver and he was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to sounds of shots being fired. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting, but no reported victims. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers conducted a traffic stop of the vehicle and detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a robbery where the suspect pointed a firearm at the victim. The suspect fled the area but was located by responding officers. A loaded firearm was located in the suspect’s vehicle the suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. The driver was found to be in possession of an illegally possessed firearm. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver fled from officers and eventually abandoned the vehicle. Officers located the suspect who was arrested for related charges.

location: Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd / Fruitridge Rd
text: Officers stopped a motorcyclist. The motorcycle was found to be stolen. The rider was arrested for related charges.
Officers stopped a parolee. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm and narcotics. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers located a vehicle that was involved in an injury hit-and-run. Officers attempted to stop the vehicle, but the suspect failed to yield, leading officers on a pursuit. Eventually, officers utilized a Pursuit Immobilization Technique maneuver and brought the pursuit to an end. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to a report of a burglary. Responding officers quickly located two suspects hiding on scene with a vehicle. During their investigation, officers located an illegal firearm in the vehicle. The suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers safely detained the occupants of the vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area for a report of sounds of shots being fired. Officers located evidence of a shooting but no reported victims. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.

location: W. El Camino Ave & Western Ave
text: Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers safely detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a suspect of a previous burglary in the area. When officers attempted to stop the suspect, he fled on his bicycle. The suspect was detained by officers and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a theft. Officers located the suspect who was identified as being on PRCS. The suspect was arrested for related charges
Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle. During their investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm with one of the occupants. The occupant was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a large number of vehicles congregating in the area and a subject waving a firearm around. Responding officers detained the suspect and during a search, located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
A vehicle collided with a Regional Transit train. Minor injuries were reported. Responding officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle for traffic violations. During their investigation, officers located an illegally possessed loaded firearm, narcotics and paraphernalia. The diver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports that a person lunged at a victim with a knife in their hand. Responding officers located the suspect and detained him. After a thorough investigation, the suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for reckless driving. The driver failed to yield and drove off at low speeds. The vehicle eventually yielded and the driver was cited for misdemeanor pursuit charges.
Officers stopped a vehicle. During the investigation, officers conducted probation search and an illegally possessed loaded firearm was located. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a subject stop on a male. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed loaded handgun and narcotics on the suspect. He was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

location: Light Sky Court & Younger Creek Dr.
text: Officers responded to reports of a sideshow gathering in the area. Officers were successful in dispersing the group and issued two traffic citations.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers stopped the vehicle and safely detained the driver. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a hit-and-run and located an adult female unresponsive. Officers attempted lifesaving measures but despite those efforts, the pedestrian was pronounced deceased on scene. The vehicle involved fled prior to police arrival. This is an active investigation.

Officers responded to a robbery at a business. Responding officers located the suspect, who fled from officers but was ultimately taken into custody by officers. No injuries were reported during the robbery and the suspect was arrested.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for reckless driving. The suspect fled from the vehicle on foot, but was caught by officers. The suspect was arrested for reckless driving, resisting arrest, and DUI related charges.

Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle that was stolen in Vallejo, CA. The driver was on parole. During the investigation, officers located heroin and an illegally possessed loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area for a report of sounds of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting but no reported victims. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of two subjects who were shot. Both individuals are in stable condition. Officers generated a report and an investigation is ongoing.

Officers responded to a report of domestic violence. When responding officers attempted to detain the suspect, he fled in his vehicle. A short, slow speed pursuit ensued until the suspect eventually pulled over and was detained. The suspect, who is on parole was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a crowd of people and some subjects with guns. Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle leaving the area of the crowd. Officers located an illegally possessed firearm, narcotics and a large sum of cash. The driver was arrested for related charges and the crowd safely dispersed.

location: Del Paso Rd & E. Commerce Wy
text: Officers responded to a report of a driver asleep at the wheel. Responding officers located the driver driving the wrong way on the roadway. Officers attempted to stop the vehicle, but it did not stop, and a short pursuit ensued. The driver eventually pulled over and was detained. The driver was found to be driving under the influence and was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to the area for reports of several subjects with guns getting into two vehicles. Responding officers located the two vehicles described and conducted traffic stops on both of them. Officers located six illegally possessed firearms and five suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of sounds of shots being fired. Officers located two suspects on scene and one of them fled on foot. Officers were able to quickly apprehend the suspect and detain him. Officers located an imitation firearm and an illegally possessed firearm on one of the suspects. One suspect was cited, and the other was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle that was driving recklessly. The driver did not stop, and a brief pursuit ensured. The driver was eventually detained and found to be driving under the influence. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle and two of the occupants fled on foot into a nearby house. Officers detained the other occupant and contained the residence within a perimeter. Officers located two illegally possessed firearms in the vehicle. Officers called the suspects out of the residence, and they were safely detained.

Officers located a stolen vehicle driving recklessly in the area and it immediately fled at a high rate of speed upon seeing the officer’s patrol car. A pursuit ensued, traveled onto the freeway and quickly returned to the city streets. The vehicle eventually became disabled, and the occupants were safely detained. They were arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a possible burglary in progress. Responding officers located the suspects as well as an illegally possessed loaded firearm and narcotics on one of them. After investigating, there appeared to be no evidence of a burglary. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle in the area. The vehicle did not stop and a pursuit ensured. The pursuit eventually ended as the vehicle became disabled. Officers leaned the vehicle was an unreported stolen vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to the area for a vehicle versus pedestrian collision. The pedestrian was transported to an area hospital where they ultimately scummed to their injuries. The driver was located on scene. Due to the circumstances, our Major Collision Investigation Unit and CSI responded to take over the investigation.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a group of subjects doing drugs in the area. When responding officers located the subjects, one of them climbed onto the roof of a trailer. The suspect on the trailer became belligerent, throwing objects off of it and challenging officers. After hours of negotiation, officers got the suspect to surrender. He was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a man with a gun. The air unit arrived on scene and located the man with the gun. The suspect was eventually detained utilizing the K-9 and less lethal deployment. An illegal firearm was located on scene. The suspect was transported to an area hospital prior to being booked for related charges.

Officers were responding to a sideshow when they observed a vehicle driving recklessly. Officers attempted to stop the vehicle; however, it did not stop and a pursuit ensued. The vehicle eventually got trapped in a court, ending the pursuit. The driver was arrested for related charges, and the vehicle was towed.

Officers responded to a report of a subject armed with a weapon. Responding officers located the suspect who was uncooperative. A less lethal tool was deployed and the suspect was detained. The suspect also had an outstanding felony warrant. The suspect was arrested for related charges and their warrant.

Officers conducted a traffic stop in the area. The driver was displaying suspicious behavior and confessed to having an illegally possessed firearm in the vehicle. The firearm was seized, and the driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle in the area for driving recklessly. The suspect vehicle did not stop, and a pursuit ensued. The vehicle eventually pulled over and the driver was uncooperative with officers. With the assistance of additional officers, the suspect was taken into custody.

Officers responded to sounds of shots being fired. Officers located evidence of a shooting, but no observed or reported property damage or victims. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. Fortunately, no victims were struck by gunfire. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located an adult male with a non-life-threatening gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital and officers conducted an investigation.

location: Delta Shores Cir N / Cosumnes River Blvd
text: Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers in our Real Time Information Center (RTIC) guided ground officers to an occupied stolen vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a robbery of a business by force. The victim sustained minor injuries and the suspects fled. Officers located one of the suspects and utilizing our Public Safety Camera Network, was able to positively identify that detained person as a suspect in the robbery. The suspect was booked on robbery related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied embezzled vehicle. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a known Parolee-at-Large in the area. The suspect fled on foot from responding officers. The parolee was reportedly observed fleeing into an apartment complex. Officers extensively searched the area, but the suspect was not located.
Officers responded to a report of sounds of shots being fired. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting, but no reported victims. An investigation was conducted, and a report was generated.
Officers responded to a vehicle sideshow in the area. Officers conducted enforcement action, and the group eventually dispersed.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle involved in a sideshow. The vehicle did not stop and a pursuit ensued. The pursuit ended when the vehicle entered the freeway and officers lost sight of the vehicle.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle. The vehicle did not stop and a pursuit ensued. The occupants of the vehicle fled from the vehicle on foot. Officers established a perimeter and searched the area. The suspect was not located.
Officers responded to a report of a vandalism. Responding officers located the vandalism suspect on scene. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. The driver was detained while walking away from the stolen vehicle. The suspect was also determined to be a parolee at large. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
