Officers responded to a report of an altercation between two people. Responding officers located the male suspect who fled from officers on foot. The male suspect was eventually detained and determined to have a warrant. The suspect was arrested and booked at juvenile hall.

Officers responded to a report of a collision involving a person on a scooter and light rail train. The scooterist was pronounce deceased on scene. Officers and detectives conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop. The vehicle did not stop and a pursuit ensued. The driver eventually pulled over and was detained. The driver was arrested for related charges and DUI.
Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a motorcycle. The motorcycle did not stop and a pursuit ensued. The pursuit was cancelled when officers lost sight of the motorcycle.

Officers responded to a report of a subject checking door handles. Responding officers located the suspect who fled from officers on foot. The suspect was eventually safely detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle. During officers' investigation, they located an illegally possessed firearm on one of the occupants. The occupants were arrested for related charges.
Officers conducted a subject stop. The suspect was found to have an illegally possessed, loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers conducted a traffic stop and the driver was detained safely. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers observed a vehicle driving recklessly in the area. Officers attempted to stop the vehicle when it collided with another vehicle, before the driver fled on foot. Officers were able to apprehend the suspect and detain him. The suspect was found to be on parole. He was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to stop a subject on a bicycle. The suspect fled and was observed to have a large knife. Less lethal was deployed to detain the suspect. The suspect was found to be on parole and in possession of drugs. The suspect was medically cleared and booked into jail.
Officers stopped a vehicle. During the investigation, officers located two illegally possessed firearms. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

location: 2000 Block of W. El Camino Ave
text: Officers responded to reports of a group of individuals with one being armed with a handgun. Responding officers located a group matching the description given and the suspects attempted to flee. Three suspects were detained and illegally possessed firearms were located. All three were arrested on firearm related charges.
Officers stopped a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The driver was arrested for a warrant and firearm related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

code: Subject Stop - Firearm & Narcotic Sales Arrest
text: A patrol sergeant contacted a subject in the area. During the investigation, officers located narcotics for sale and a firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

location: Del Paso Rd / E. Commerce Wy
text: Officers stopped a vehicle. During a probation search, officers located drugs and a loaded shotgun. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers attempted to stop a vehicle for reckless driving. The driver failed to yield and led officers on a pursuit. The pursuit terminated on the freeway and the suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located a juvenile subject with at least one gunshot wound. The juvenile was transported to an area hospital where they are expected to survive. Officers conducted an extensive investigation and a report was generated

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located an adult female victim with at least one gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital. Officers searched the area extensively but were not able to locate a suspect.

Officers attempted to stop a suspect on a bicycle for a traffic violation. The suspect did not stop and officers pursued him until he was safely detained. The suspect had an outstanding felony warrant and was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a person smoking narcotics outside. When officers arrived, the suspect attempted to walk away, leaving behind narcotic paraphernalia. The suspect was detained and upon records check, was found to have a felony no-bail warrant for burglary. The suspect was arrested.

A motor officer stopped a vehicle for a vehicle code violation. The driver had a felony no-bail warrant for firearm possession. During the investigation, the passenger was found to be in possession of an illegally possessed firearm. Both were arrested.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting and brandishing incident. The suspect was inside of a residence and officers were able to negotiate with the suspect to come out peacefully. During the investigation, officers located a firearm. The suspect was taken into custody for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

location: La Pera Ct / La Fresa Ct
text: Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers contacted subjects near a vehicle. Officers discovered one of the individuals had a warrant for failing to register as a sex offender. During the investigation, officers located narcotics on two other individuals that were present. The sex offender was arrested for related charges and the other two were cited and released for narcotic possession charges.

It was reported by a neighbor that they heard a gunshot coming from their neighbor's apartment. Patrol officers, including Crisis Negotiators, K-9, and Uncrewed Areal Systems responded to the scene. Officers surrounded the apartment and attempted to convince the suspect to peacefully surrender, however the suspect was not responsive. An armored vehicle was deployed to allow officers to safely get closer to the building and after more announcements, the suspect surrendered. During the investigation, officers located a firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Responding officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Two victims were eventually located, both with non-life-threatening gunshot injuries. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated. There is no suspect information to release at this time.

Officers responded to a call of a subject causing a disturbance in front of a business. When responding officers attempted to the detain the suspect, he fled on foot and a pursuit ensued. Officers eventually detained the suspect, and he was found to have several outstanding warrants. He was arrested for his warrants and related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Responding officers located a male adult victim with at least one gunshot wound. The victim was transported to an area hospital where he is in stable condition. Officers did not locate a suspect on scene. The investigation is ongoing.

Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Through a thorough investigation, officers learned the caller had actually fired an illegally possessed, stolen firearm in his own residence. The suspect was arrested for related charges. No injuries or victims were reported.

Officers observed a subject known to have a felony warrant. The suspect fled from officers on foot and they pursued him. The suspect was eventually safely detained and was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle when it fled at a high rate of speed. A short distance later, the suspect vehicle pulled over and the driver was detained. The suspect was arrested for DUI and related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic stop of a vehicle that was initially compliant. As officers approached the vehicle, it fled at a high rate of speed and a pursuit ensued. The driver eventually pulled over and was detained. Officers located cannabis, a large sum of cash, and illegal fireworks in the vehicle. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a vehicle versus pedestrian collision. The pedestrian was transported to an area hospital for medical treatment. The Major Collision Investigation Unit responded to the scene and took over the investigation.

Officers responded to a report of a subject in the area with two outstanding felony warrants. The suspect attempted to flee from officers on foot but was safely apprehended. The suspect was arrested for his warrants and related charges.

Officers in the area attempted to conduct a traffic stop of a vehicle. The occupants of the vehicle fled on foot but were quickly apprehended by officers with the assistance of our Air Unit. An illegally possessed firearm was located and one of the suspects was found to have an outstanding felony warrant. The suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. Officers safely detained the suspect driver, and they were arrested for related charges.

Officers located a stolen vehicle in the area. The suspect fled on foot from responding officers but detained a short distance later. The suspect was a parolee at large and was found to be in possession of drugs and burglary tools. The suspect was arrested for his felony warrant and related charges.
